comments: I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.
Cool I like the complexity of it, it isn't always too easy. But I would like a 'reset' option so I don't have to drag the arrows back every time I go wrong
The controls can sometimes be a little weird, but other then that everything is perfect. It's just a really good game in general. The animation is so adorable.

descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
recentChanges: - A new challenge: Mirror mode! Another perspective to solve the puzzles  [Complete 100 levels to unlock mirror mode]
- Expert Mode par values are now tougher on some levels!  [Complete 200 levels to unlock Expert Mode]
- Improved tutorials to help new players
summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

description: ‚ÄúThe Outlived‚Äù is a Survival game in which players connect to the internet to compete with other Survivors. Initially, the Survivors must master all sorts of basic survival skills, including hunting, gather food and water resources, create their own dwellings and defensive walls. In a more intermediate level, the Survivors will be able to craft their own Equipment and Motorbike, and even create their own flamethrower to burn down zombies. descriptionHTML:
“The Outlived” is a Survival game in which players connect to the internet to compete with other Survivors. Initially, the Survivors must master all sorts of basic survival skills, including hunting, gather food and water resources, create their own dwellings and defensive walls. In a more intermediate level, the Survivors will be able to craft their own Equipment and Motorbike, and even create their own flamethrower to burn down zombies. When playing in Multiplayer mode, the Survivors will compete among each other for the last living Survivor.

Features:
- Team Match: create a Team with other players, defend yourself together with other Survivors against hordes of zombies.
- Survival Challenge: use your knowledge, skills and strategy to compete against other players.
- Multi-Survival Challenge: compete against other players in Teams.
- Solo Survival: defeat other players in a multiplayer competition, defeat all players and be the last to stand!
- Сraft system :get food, hunt, find useful objects or weapons and create your own! 
- Competitive:Fight with other people ,Resist zombie invasion
- Explore with other survivors on different map:Rocky filed/Pind Woods/Ruined Store/Quelt Clinic

Follow us at:

Custom service:theoutlived@herogame.com
https://business.facebook.com/theoutlived
summary: Explore with other survivors, live or die!
title: The Outlived

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone üòÖ

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Although FoE is very enjoyable, it can get very complicated, especially for new players. The biggest drawback is the lack of instructions...new players, unless taken under the wing of an experienced player, have to fumble through at first, many times guessing or using trial and error to accomplish the simplest things.

At first I was a little unhappy with the amount of stuff I can do with spending diamonds, but I now find it refreshing, not to spend active hours on a game in order to receive a reward. I'm glad they reward patience.

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

summary: Build and advance your city from a stone age village to a future metropolis.
title: Forge of Empires

comments: An honestly good game with neat intentions, but I do have a complaint that is probably common for other. It's that the game just freezes abruptly and you can't do anything unless you restart it. Hopefully this gets resolved quickly, but other than that it's a good game

Best drag racing game I've played in a while, doesn't force you to spend money but the option is there.  Not in a rush for class E to be released since class D isn't finished yet, in expert races I only see a pink wire frame of the interior and no rev indicator, negatively impacting gameplay since most quests call for these races.  Otherwise great game.

Like the game so far. How do you change the camera view to inside the cockpit. There doesn't seem to be an option anywhere to change camera as advertised. Maybe I'm missing something. Other then that it's very fun game. Thank you

description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!
descriptionHTML:
Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING
Styling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.

DRIVER'S SKILLS
Upgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.

TUNING
You are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.

DRIVING PHYSICS
It's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!

Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You‚Äôll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTSüí∏PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!üí∏OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

recentChanges: Hello, bidders! You asked for it, and we deliver! Get ready for the largest Pawn Empire update to date!

- Various minor fixes to the HUD and the code, to give you an smoother experience!

description: Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way. descriptionHTML:
Dash headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D endless-run adventure! Take on level after level as you fly your cuddly Fluffy through danger with just a finger. Dodge a blaze, snake around ice, go rolling past lasers and escape other crazy hazards that block your way.

The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in.

Features:
• Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s popular with kids, but still has enough fast arcade action to give anyone a rush.
• Dodge screen-blurring ice blocks, escape flames and blaze past loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
• Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 cool Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.

The perfect game for rolling out to kids (yet still super addicting to adults) who enjoy the popular endless-run gameplay style and fast action!

This adorable & addictive game is very fun to play at any time of the day! It is definitely a close competitor of the infamous"Candy Crush" trend. For such a simple concept, it never ceases to amaze me; especially since I can't seem to get a long enough winning streak to increase my stack count. I admit, I suck at this game... Yet I can't stop playing it! 4/5 stars for me. Loses a star for excessive ads and lagging during the game.

Very very addictive pass time. Only a lil disappointed with the adds popping out every now and than. I know its a free app and adds are inevitable but try reducing the number of time it should appear not after each and every round.

descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

Word Connect is an addictive, challenging game that passes time while putting your knowledge to the test. I enjoy playing this game with passengers when I go on a road trip. I rate this game 8.9/10. The reason being is that several answers aren't exactly words. Despite that, I highly recommend this game.
I find it challenging but  some of the words questionable. And if the last word is the one you want a definition for, you're out of luck because it goes right to the next game or ad. Frustrating.
The most addicting and relaxing word game I've ever played. And there's no timer, so you can take your time and zone out. A good way for me to calm down in anxious moments.
Ok game.but so many annoying ads. Not at all kids safe ads. So better dont install this app with so much vulgar ads.

comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. üòä  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Game is fun. But giving me pop ups to bring me back to the game while it's not open is a nono. Especially when it takes up half the screen. I'd give 5 stars cause i had fun playong this, but this one thing is annoying. Especially with the amount of ads, it shows you just wanna push people to keep playing for that ad revenue. Won't be downloading any of your games after i delete this now.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay

• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

comments: Fun game, good time killer, great graphics. Unfortunately,  like with many other games, they sucker you in with rewards at the start only for you to soon hit a paywall. It's  either grind and hope you get lucky or give into the many game ads promoting cash purchases. Anything involving actually online play (co-op, PvP etc) seems to freeze or have crazy lag. Good game, definitely has room for improvement.

It's a good cover-based shooter, with some pretty creative characters and a good pace for quick battles. The unlock system is more than fair, with the ability to save currencies for that one big purchase. I enjoy the ability to play at my own pace without sacrificing my life to the game (cough*Kabam*cough) and I'm having a lot of fun. I've noticed that PVP tends to favor Savage, when he activates Spray and Pray once, half the opposing team dies. Twice, and the round is over. Otherwise a very well done and enjoyable game.

I really enjoy the action this game brings along with good looks and simple controls. Too many times development teams get caught up in the visuals or complex control schemes and forget about what gamers really love and that's not having a complex control panel with nice smooth transition from level to level. Thank you for making this game a joy to play every time I turn it on.

Nice game ...the only problem  I say would be its pay to win philosophy. Yeah it's easy in the beginning but the gear gets really scarce to if your really trying to win it'll be next to impossible to do so with out swiping that good 'ol debit card. Otherwise it's a fun and awesome game. That is in the beginning....

Good concept. Good game. Many glitches. For a game that's touted for and based on pvp it makes no sense that %80 of the time the game freezes going into a pvp battle. It's okay though, you can close it and then immediately reopen it to a message that tells you that you died. Fix your freezing problems and I'd give you 4 stars.

Really solid graphics and game play for mobile. Doesn't want to work with my Bluetooth controller. As a free game they have really doubled down on the shards and multiple currencies to try to get you to spend. You really need to grind if you want to unlock anything without paying.

comments: As others have said, the longer you play, the worse it performs and the more space it takes up, and after a while ads start causing the game to crash. However I've managed to get around it by reinstalling every couple of weeks. Other than that it's a good little game.

It's a pretty fun game, better than I thought it would be. There is one problem, you don't really need to buy "Flooz", but if you do. The prices are a little outrageous. Like 5$ for 100 Flooz, seems a little money hungry. And 100 Flooz for 15 days is 29$ is outrageous as well. I've played other games with better things to do besides upgrading and usually 100 "diamonds" of anything would last 30 and would cost 10-15$. Seems like you're trying to rip people off. Besides the money hungry creators, good game to kill time.

It has bugs. Like how sometimes skills don't activate right away, and on rare occasions, not at all. The currencies are pretty fair; I don't feel like have to buy anything (sucks for the devs, but it's not like I can buy anything even if I wanted to). Events keep the game fresh, and I always feel like I have something to do at all times, so it does a good job of keeping me occupied for 20-30 minutes at a time.

The first idle game that caught my attention. At first, i thought that it's just "one of those idle games".. But, the more I play the more i get hooked because of unique game mechanics. I might give this 5 stars in the future.

I think the game would be enjoyable if it did not crash ALL the time. Get to a new level? Crash. Watch a video? Crash. Crash Them All might be a more fitting name for the only game that has ever crashed more than once on this phone.

Incredible game play it for hours and love it soooo much only good things to say other than server connecting but it's no big deal love the game the style the graphics the game play is all awsome I do have some ideas for the game if your interested number one being adding carnivore and herbivore types into the game so you could have dinosaurs and number 2 is world bosses were the entire community can all defeat one boss and 3 to have the ability to friend people not through Facebook. Love the game it's so good thanks for putting so much hard work into it and adding awsome features cheers

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely NEW KIND OF PUZZLE GAME! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win! It’s FREE and EASY to play, whether you’re young or just young at heart, so jump into the fun! There’s no other game like it.

***HOW TO PLAY***

Here’s how you can rule the pool!

SLING, BOUNCE, AND MATCH
* Enjoy the game’s unique “sling” mechanic – just pull back the floaties, release, and let them bounce! Match the floaties in the pools to complete the levels and earn keys.

USE GREAT POWER-UPS
* The ROCKET removes all floaties of one color;
* The UNICORN will make all your floaties multicolored for a turn; and

USE THE KEYS to UNLOCK, BUILD and CUSTOMIZE THE WATER PARK
* Use the keys you earn to open new levels and unlock more imaginatively-shaped pools with fun backgrounds.
* Complete the 360 EXCITING LEVELS and beat all the challenging obstacles.
* Explore worlds filled with pirates, dragons, and more!

Join Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger in this exciting water park adventure. It’s the ultimate pool party and everyone's invited! Get ready to party with Talking Tom like never before as you bounce, splash, play, and build the greatest water park ever!

Jump in and download Talking Tom Pool now – it’s free to play!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

No touch response. I downloaded the patch, watched the intro, connect to google play account, input name (no illegal characters) and the button to create does not light up or respond to touch. LG G5 Canadian. Will rate better when this is fixed. As the game was just released I understand there may be bugs that need squashing. Good luck!

Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Little disappointed in the way too long forced tutorial. After stage 1-5 I decided I didn't have time to see when the tutorial would finish. I'll try again later but so far it's a fairly simple, but quality SS fighter. Which is why the tutorial seems excessive. Game just is not that complicated.

comments: This is the best life simulator game by far. Instead of just focusing on getting rich this game has many other focuses like love, nationality, jobs, kids etc. The one thing that isn't at all necessary but I kind of want to see is a avatar for the character you're playing as. Perfect game. üòÅüëç  EDIT: hi just reporting on a glitch in the game. There's an option to transition your gender bit even though my character is over 18 they can't do it. Otherwise still a perfect game.

I think it's incredible and I am hooked. Although I do hope for more such as, instead of just instagram famous, perhaps become a famed scientist, actor, writer, astronaut or business person OR be known as beloved (or not so) Educator/Teacher etc. A bit more drama added with partner/children good and not so good. Varying reactions to their dilemmas, perhaps even a child dating, married, having a child (grandkids) and other random child updates with or without the option to react accordingly. Overall, addictive and thoughtful game.

Hi - playing this game for a few months now and a big fan. I suggested during beta phase that there should be an option of money management as well. We can be a millionaire but dont know what to do with all that liquid. We should be able to invest in moveable and immoveble assets. Should be able to open a company/business and invest in other company's stocks etc. This game will be even more interesting that way. Hope we will see these features soon. Thanks.

Truly amazing game. Highly recommended to anyone who likes simulator games. Works without wifi and the developers listen to what u have to say. Sure, there are a few glitches but I'm sure they'll get fixed over time. Loved it Edit: can you transition your gender without having gender dysphoria

I have been playing through the beta phase, and am completely hooked. You can pick it up and play whenever the mood strikes. It is easy to grasp, every new life is different, and it is engrossing without being addictive. Once you're done with a life you can create a new one or close the app and move on with your real one. There is no waiting for something to build or happen, there are very few ads and most are by choice to gain something. There are no in-app purchases to enhance game play, its all there from the beginning. The developers have done an incredible job with a simple concept.

First of all, congratulations on the full release! I've been playing this game for a few months now and I'm absolutely hooked. Whenever I'm bored or don't want to use my phone's data, I just play this game. There are a few things that I think would be cool to add in or go more in depth with, but other than that, this game is borderline perfect! I reccomend downloading
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

descriptionHTML:
[Awards]
Golden Plume Award for best picture quality
2017 Mobile Online Game Award for Best Writing
4 Asian Game Award Nominations includes “10 Creative MMORPG”
The Most Expected Mobile Game of Global Kingdom War Players in IGN Research
——The most romantic 3D Kingdom War mobile game in 2017, Sword of Romance

「Background」
Lv Dongxuan, the No.1 master of swordcraft, reincarnated and fell in love with the daughter of the infante but they were finally pulled apart. When they met again, the poor girl was about to die of sickness.
To save her life, Lv took up his sword and killed countless immortals. He finally swore to the god that he would give up his life, instead, the girl will become immortal.
---"I keep seeking my love, but finally I find you and will keep holding your hand..."

[Features]
---Find lover for years---
Wander on earth for thousands of year for the girl in red! The most beautiful marriage in mobile games of 2017, romantic encounter, gorgeous wedding, for you!

---God of Kingdom War---
Will not regret to die for the nation in the Kingdom War! With Command System in game, you can direct the kingdom war yourself. Win the war definitely!

---Anchor plays with you---
Lovely dimples smile, fine eyes blink, exceeding charm awaits your admiring! Anchors from China mainland, Taiwan, Singapore and Malaysia gather in the game to play with you!

---Eminent 3D world---
Holographic of 720 degree brings you an eminent world with Dynamic particle rendering. 6 nations, 12 sceneries are in the map. Wherever you go, fantasy world is there.

---Set the trend with Fashionwears---
Fairy style, Girl-next-door style, Uniform temptation, or swimming suit, there is always a suitable for you.

With the equal drop rate, non-top-up player can be powerful! Players can trade fairly without any intervention of system

Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires! There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends. ‚òÖ	BUILD literally anything ‚Äì castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!‚òÖ	JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!‚òÖ	PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES  from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!‚òÖ	UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!‚òÖ	MONTHLY UPDATES! descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!
★ JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!
★ PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!
★ UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!
★ MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!
★ EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them!
★ CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!


BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe
** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **
Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.

Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!

description: ** Over 5 Million Downloads! **Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It‚Äôs basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!FACTSThe Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.FEATURES* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game* Create your own player and join your favorite team!* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!* No Fouls* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.** Barangay Ginebra** Alaska Aces** Magnolia Hotshots** San Miguel Beermen** Tropang TNT** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters** Meralco Bolts** NLEX Road Warriors** Phoenix Fuel Masters** Global Port Batang Pier** KIA Picanto** Blackwater EliteGuest Teams:* Gilas Pilipinas* 2017 All Star Luzon* 2017 All Star Visayas* 2017 All Star MindanaoPERMISSIONS* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statisticsWe will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.Like our facebook page to get updates and join contestfb.com/pbaslamgameAnd visit our websites at:www.philippineslam.comwww.ranidagames.comFor comments and suggestions you can email us atinfo[at]ranidagames.com
descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon
* 2017 All Star Visayas
* 2017 All Star Mindanao

PERMISSIONS
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player
* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player
* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos
* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statistics

We will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.

Like our facebook page to get updates and join contest
fb.com/pbaslamgame

And visit our websites at:
www.philippineslam.com
www.ranidagames.com

For comments and suggestions you can email us at
info[at]ranidagames.com
developerAddress: Macahora Building, Pacita Ave. San Pedro Laguna 4023 Philippines.
summary: The best free basketball game for your mobile devices!
title: Philippine Slam! 2018 - Basketball Slam!

descriptionHTML:
From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!

In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.

4 different camera angles
For a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.

Realistically modeled motorcycles
We have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.

A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels
4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!

4 different control options
We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

Support in 23 different languages
Don’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!

Escape Mode
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!

Daily Bonus Mode
We didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!

Private Mode
You get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!

Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!
developerAddress: P.O.Box 16111 RAK FTZ Ras Al Khaimah UAE
summary: A brand new motor racing experience full of fun!
title: Racing Fever: Moto

comments: This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

title: Parker & Lane: Criminal Justice

from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

Or perhaps you‚Äôll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl‚Äôs crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham‚Äôs assault rifle. ‚Ä¢ FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat‚Ä¢ COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead‚Ä¢ CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission‚Ä¢ HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead ‚Ä¢ JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards‚ÄúThrow in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. That‚Äôs No Man‚Äôs Land in a nutshell.‚Äù - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms

For player support, please visit:
nextgames.helpshift.com
recentChanges: The Walking Dead Season 8 missions continue every Monday! Watch the episode, play through the memorable moments the next day in No Man‚Äôs Land and earn Rick tokens along the way.
Gather your guild and explore the new ‚ÄúIn the Dead of Night‚Äù challenge.
The update includes many bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Play AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead! Complete Episode 1 and unlock Daryl to your team!
title: The Walking Dead No Man's Land

comments: The game has gorgeous graphics. Each scene is very detailed and fun to play. Some are a little difficult to get through if you like to keep your brightness low like me and some items are incredibly tiny to find. But it has a fun premise and it's a pretty good time waster. However, you can't play for long. Each play takes 20 energy and it goes by quickly. Waiting for it to refill takes a long time. Getting stars to solve cases also takes some time. It's basically the wait time in this game that kinda kills it.

This is a really enjoyable game, especially for fans of HP and/or the fantasy genre. The graphics are beautiful and the characters look so real. I just wish energy wasn't used up so quickly. At 20 points of energy a pop you can't really play for long, and the XP needed to level up is also high so you usually have to wait for the energy to refill. Also, when you level up you don't get a complete energy refill; you only get about half. Waiting time to complete tasks is also too high IMO. At least a couple of hours if not longer. With any other game this is usually enough to turn me off but the gameplay, the story and the graphics are so good that I'm willing to exercise a lot of patience.

Beautiful hidden object experience. Offers a variety of gameplay including mirrored levels, timed levels, and spot the differences. The Facebook connection is there without being thrown in your face like some other games and is a nice subtle addition. It does work off of energy however I am willing to stick it out just for the storyline.

It's a good game but having to wait so long for the energy build up takes away the excitement of the game play. Iv noticed alot of other game users have the same outlook on this game. Even the timers for tasks take way to long.. 6 hours to complete? Really? Why so long? People will get bored and find another stimulating game. This is based on the whole wizarding world so it should be alot more magical and less time consuming.

Love the game overall but it takes way too long to build up energy. Because of this you are only able to play for very short periods of time before you have to wait for the energy to build back up. Also some of the 'inspection' actions take way too long. Waiting 6+ hours for an action to be completed is excessive. I would love to be able to play the game for more than just a couple of minutes a day. I realize it is done to encourage people to make in app purchases, however, perhaps you could provide a paid version of the app to avoid this. I love the game and would love to be able to play it more.

Love this game, but it has only 14 cases!! WTH?? The last case acted like you were going on to another one, but no. Feel like it shouldn't have been released with only 14 cases. Very similar to Criminal Case in a lot of ways. The upgrades help a lot, but it takes a while before you notice their effect and cost is too high, IMO.
description: Fantastic Beasts‚Ñ¢: Cases From The Wizarding WorldMaster your magical skills as you delve into your wizarding world to investigate unexplained happenings. In an new adventure inspired by J.K. Rowling‚Äôs Wizarding World, enjoy all-new experiences as you discover hidden objects, interview witnesses, analyze evidence, and cast spells to uncover and protect the magical creatures at the center of every mysterious case.Solve All-New Magical MysteriesClues to unlocking the secrets of your wizarding world are hiding in plain sight. Only you have the skills and talent to find the answers as you dive into the elusive world of magical creatures. You‚Äôll cast spells, brew potions and decipher hidden clues to investigate and solve all-new mysteries.Help the Ministry of MagicThe Ministry of Magic is relying on you to crack the case as one of the brightest new recruits of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures. From nifflers to unicorns, centaurs to dragons, you protect them all. Use your training to investigate beastly happenings and prove yourself as the smartest, sharpest wizard.Make Magic With Your FriendsJoin the magical community and unravel the secrets of your wizarding world together. See how you stack up against your fellow recruits, and lend your friends a helping hand.
descriptionHTML:
Fantastic Beasts™: Cases From The Wizarding World
Master your magical skills as you delve into your wizarding world to investigate unexplained happenings. In an new adventure inspired by J.K. Rowling’s Wizarding World, enjoy all-new experiences as you discover hidden objects, interview witnesses, analyze evidence, and cast spells to uncover and protect the magical creatures at the center of every mysterious case.

Solve All-New Magical Mysteries
Clues to unlocking the secrets of your wizarding world are hiding in plain sight. Only you have the skills and talent to find the answers as you dive into the elusive world of magical creatures. You’ll cast spells, brew potions and decipher hidden clues to investigate and solve all-new mysteries.

Help the Ministry of Magic
The Ministry of Magic is relying on you to crack the case as one of the brightest new recruits of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures. From nifflers to unicorns, centaurs to dragons, you protect them all. Use your training to investigate beastly happenings and prove yourself as the smartest, sharpest wizard.

Make Magic With Your Friends
Join the magical community and unravel the secrets of your wizarding world together. See how you stack up against your fellow recruits, and lend your friends a helping hand.

comments: Great time passer except when you have to get some sleep and you have to do just one more level...me right now! Forced myself to quit. So far not a press for time which is nice. So many match three puts a time limit. So far I see 900 available levels so I'm not sure if time is a factor yet. I hope not. I play to relax. Not get stressed by a clock ticking down on me. They offer coins so you really don't need to purchase if you don't want to. Relaxing and challenging at the same time. Good game to get.

I have really been enjoying playing this game. Some of the levels I've been flying through. I like that you don't have to wait 24 hours if you decide not to purchase anything. But now I am stuck on level 184 and I have no clue how to get out of it. I did have a couple of levels where I saw a pop-up that said I'm now a tester. After that I was able to move the flowers anyway I wanted. I wish I had that now because a few more tries and I'm going to uninstall this game.

You don't have to wait for lives to refill which is the biggest upside.  Ads always seem to come up after your out of moves for the level but before you click okay to move to the next level (so I have lost my progress on a level before). Strategic game play that's good for passing the time but keeping your mind engaged.

Updating for the 3rd time. Love the music but going to uninstall bc of level 652. Wish the sorry, meant Winter not Harvest blitz had the same background music, but ... Oh well. I'll find another developer.  Wth is up with level 652!? This is impossible!!!!! Graphics could be a tad bit better, but overall it's ok. I like not having to wait for lives in order to continue to play, sweet! The ads aren't so bad, just click back as began & it's all good.  My most favorite part of this game ... drumroll ü•Å ... the music. üéµüé∑Classical instrumental jazzüé∑üéπüé∂    Almost forgot, how would players know flowers can be swapped within the bubbles? Bc some bubbles cannot be swappedü§î

This game is very addictive & fun BUT, when u get to level 652, that's where ALL the fun stops. How in the hell are we supposed to rescue 48 garden critters with only "13" freakin' moves. Need at least 30 moves. Oh & please do something about all those SAME ads that keeps popping up. Smh.

Too many ads. There is an ad at the bottom of the screen during game play. The ads sometimes flash and disrupt the game. There is also a 5 second ad after each level. Also the scoring is messed up. Had 20 moves and solved the game in two moves, so you would think the final score would give 3 stars, nope only 1 star.  The only positive thing about this game is that the flowers are pretty.

comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. Sometimes I will go a whole day with no shields and the whole time I'm getting attacked. The other thing is the bonus spin. Never have I won more that 250k coins. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

This game was fun initially. But as you rank up, you gain coins and then before you get to even use them, someone is able to steal them from you (by random spinning.. no planned attack!!)   If you play this game,DO NOT SPEND MONEY TO BUY SPINS. People can steal your earnings... so you basically pay actual money, to give others coins...

I need help so I spent $10 in order to get to the next level which I did where I could get my daily spin and hit jackpot and it gave me my fox but I closed the app and it took me backwards to the last level even though I already built in my new level. Please help and put me back to the level ahead of me as this is very upsetting for spending money and being right back where I was before. Fix it and I'll give it 5 stars for everything thank you

I gave 2 star only because when i joined my frnd i did not got any spin..... Though that is shown in my village news...  This is the 2nd time missed the spin.. Do you know it is diffcult to get spin and when you convince a friend to join and you got nothing.....

First everything went okay. But recently I can't download any special event. The game stall when you have  to raid or attack just loading the whole time. Even the spin is now stopping you can press the spin until your blue nothing. Maybe if this is fixed we could try for a higher rating.
I'm  not happy there's no customer service can help to solve the problem. Waiting for the reply but no one care  try to fix this problem before you lost your customer.
description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top!

comments: Cool concept. Needs a better tutorial, takes a while to learn. Uninstalled after realizing that the game is rigged. It wont let you win Mission 12 no matter how good you are. Keeps destroying the ensari ship I'm supposed to protect whenever I'm about to win. I'd rather they enforce a player level requirement to unlock the missions, than than rig the game to always lose. What's up with that?

The game is good and all, but a little unfair in the single player mode. Once the timer gets to 4:30, my ship gets overloaded, right. This is no problem when in pvp, but during missions, it is a big problem,  since your enemy ship won't sustain the same damage. It's okay if your enemy has a space station or something on the same scale, but if it's a ship, it should sustain the same damage. Please do consider this.

After playing all 3 playable races i have come to the conclusion that they are exceptionally unbalanced. When one race makes up for more then 60% of the top players you know you have an issue. Would like it a lot more if it gets balanced.
Can compare to Clash Royale with a space theme. Bit hard to get into, once you work out the tactics it's great. No autoplay and yawn here.

I could straightaway give a 5 for this game. It's new, nice graphics, light on my phone, and has interesting gameplay. Been playing this for 3 days and not its unusual for me to be hooked frequently playing the same game for days. However, few issues are 1.) once you experience a hickup on your connection it wont reconnect again. 2.) sometimes there's no option to tap and proceed to play from the home screen. 3) lastly, I bit less of an issue. Though im winning, I didnt have a chance initially to configure my troops before the tournaments for tier. luckily I am winning so far. It would be great if players are notified  first prior to the actual event so everyone can get ready before the actual accounts are submitted for random tournament. Feedback please. Thanks
The game is damn fun, yet campaign is unfair slightly when ship gets overloaded... The game is like a combination of Clash royale, Mini guns, and metal slug (ya metal slug xD)
description: Battle in real-time with players from around the world and climb the global rankings and take part in worldwide tournaments. Travel through the galaxy to experience the epic story of three races ‚Äì the Terrans, Ensari and Zoltarians ‚Äì as they fight for survival and supremacy on the Galactic Frontline. Battle Guide:As the battle begins, both sides‚Äô ships will occupy opposite ends of the map. Each captain will command a ship, up to 4 tactical escort vessels, and up to 6 combat units. Producing units and using skills requires energy. Energy cost, maximum energy level and regeneration rates vary based on time, upgrades, and map features. The ship is the core system of any battle. If the enemy‚Äôs ship is destroyed, you win the battle. You need to use your energy wisely and make strategic decisions based on your opponent‚Äôs actions. Using your tactical skills in the right place at the right time, as well as deploying the best combat units for the situation, is the key to victory.Take the opportunity to attack your enemy‚Äôs ship right away and dictate the rhythm of the battle. The Galactic Frontline is waiting. Join the fight!Features:    Battle in real-time, anytime!     Challenge players worldwide!    Build and command an interstellar fleet!     Collect over 50 different combat units and tactical escort vessels.       Follow an epic storyline and explore a galaxy at war.     Lead an alliance against the world's best!      Join exciting global tournaments! Official Website: https://galacticfrontline.163.com Facebook Fanpage:https://www.facebook.com/GalacticFrontline/
descriptionHTML:
Battle in real-time with players from around the world and climb the global rankings and take part in worldwide tournaments.
Travel through the galaxy to experience the epic story of three races – the Terrans, Ensari and Zoltarians – as they fight for survival and supremacy on the Galactic Frontline.

Battle Guide:
As the battle begins, both sides’ ships will occupy opposite ends of the map. Each captain will command a ship, up to 4 tactical escort vessels, and up to 6 combat units. Producing units and using skills requires energy. Energy cost, maximum energy level and regeneration rates vary based on time, upgrades, and map features.
The ship is the core system of any battle. If the enemy’s ship is destroyed, you win the battle. You need to use your energy wisely and make strategic decisions based on your opponent’s actions. Using your tactical skills in the right place at the right time, as well as deploying the best combat units for the situation, is the key to victory.
Take the opportunity to attack your enemy’s ship right away and dictate the rhythm of the battle.

The Galactic Frontline is waiting. Join the fight!

Battle in real-time, anytime!
Challenge players worldwide!
Build and command an interstellar fleet!
