descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
recentChanges: „Éª Added a Skip button to opening tutorial.
Remix 10, made of some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play, is here!
There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?
summary: Remix 10 is here!
title: Super Mario Run

Seinfeld is an American sitcom that originally ran for nine seasons on NBC, from 1989 to 1998. It was created by Larry David and Jerry Seinfeld, the latter starring as a fictionalized version of himself. Set predominantly in an apartment building in Manhattan's Upper West Side in New York City, the show features a handful of Jerry's friends and acquaintances, particularly best friend George Costanza (Jason Alexander), former girlfriend Elaine Benes (Julia Louis-Dreyfus), and neighbor across the hall Cosmo Kramer (Michael Richards). It is often described as being "a show about nothing," as many of its episodes are about the minutiae of daily life.

This is another one of those "easy to learn, hard to master" games. Although it may seem difficult, a little bit of practice can go a LONG way. Its possible to get multiple times the enemy's score in one game by ones self, or even get 27 points yourself with no enemy points, but its not really that hard. While there are a few glitches, its really fun.

It would be a great addition and add much more longterm playability. Ive also notoced nobody i play with has upgraded tanks and 95% the have robotic brainless type movements leading me to the asumption that we are mostly playing against bots. descriptionHTML:
Tank Raid Online – a new and unique mini MOBA has come to Play Store!

Join up with friends, plan your tactics and get ready for an intense real-time PvP battle! Unlock more than 20 fast-paced tanks of exclusive skills, own the best arsenal of weapons and put your strategy into action in 4 different multiplayer game modes:

- 3v3 Galaxy Football: capture the crystal ball from the center of the map, holding and “shooting” it to opposing team’s goal while fighting with them. A game of true football competitive style!

- 3v3 Team Death-match: Gain scores for your team by eliminating opponents, fight to absorb the ultimate power of the galaxy stone which appears at last 1 minute of the battle. The team with most scores at the end of the match wins!

- 1v4 Solo Death-match: 5 players battle in a round arena on Galaxy. Upgrade your tank’s damage and HP by 10% in the middle of the fight by owning the galaxy stone or stealing it from others. The player with most kills wins.

- 1v4 Solo Survival: (Coming soon)

FEATURES:
- More than 7 stunning arenas on Galaxy for all players regardless of level
- Be creative as much as you want with your tactics: more than 20 tanks, each with signature attack and unique skill, together with 15 cool weapons (and more to come).
- Battle solo with world-wide players or play with friends
- Upgrade your tanks and weapons to max levels
- Communicate and team up with other tank heroes with in-game chat functionality
- A cross-platform game: play it on your phone or PC
- Free to win: equal chance to win and equal access to all in-game elements for everyone.
- Constant update on game content every month
- Daily and weekly champion system where you compete with only other 20 people for juicy rewards

Collect cards to upgrade your favorite tanks and skills. Compete for higher ranking in your country and world leaderboards. Play it now and be the star of all galaxy battles!

PERMISSION NEED
- Since you can share your victory in the game, we need your external storage permission as below, please accept:
• READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
• WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

Need any trouble solved? Contact our social pages for fastest support:
facebook.com/tankraidonline
instagram.com/tankraid
twitter.com/tankraidonline
developerAddress: 180-182 Ly Chinh Thang, Ward 9, District 3, HCMC, VietNam
summary: Fun online tank shooting game comes out 2017! Enter the arenas & play now!üëçüòâ
title: Tank Raid Online

comments: I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

descriptionHTML:
Make a delicious Vanilla sugar cookies or yummy berry ice pops! Go shop with the ingredients needed and follow the detailed instructions to learn each step of the recipe. Enjoy cooking with the Chef recipes and mimic the mouth-watering outcome!

Features:
* Shop all the ingredients required for the recipe.
* Go to the counter and scan the products.
* Dice all the fresh fruits and combine in the mixer.
* Mix the fruits to make a delicious blended juice
* Pour in gelatine mixture and make a yogurt mix.
* Transfer to popsicle tray and chill until it solidify.

comments: Really like this game. It's like the love child of Civilization and Clash of Clans. Love the fact there's a different designs for units and buildings when using different nations. Lots of strategy and depth when it comes to battle. Also, includes events based on history. The only thing on my wishlist for this game is that they add a nation unaffiliated with any country and does not have special units so players can play through the default units and buildings through the ages like Yuri in C&C.

The Best Strategy Game I've ever played. Its because It has Unique way to play than other games.Every Level u go U will find out fun & adventures. I got addicted to this game. Speacilly I like the gameplay of this game because Its seems so real.Like,Survived soilder will return to your base,troops vs troops fight, no magic spell,Human made Weapon used in this game which is possible & I love unlocking new ages here. Supper Cool Game

This is one of those City Builder games where all that really matters is who has put in more time. The difference between ages is so dramatic that anyone who is an age above you will always win just because they have put more time into the game. That's just how it is and it becomes very empty eventually. You stand no chance against players with more play time.

Best empire game I've had. And I've downloaded probably all of them. Great aesthetic changes when upgrading buildings. The fact you can actually strategically place troops and attack is awesome. Love that resources respawn and that there's animations when farming them. The different nations with their advantages is a lovely touch.  The one draw back I would say is that it's expensive in a new players city to fulfil the task to join an alliance. Not a huge issue. Just would be nice to join friends sooner.  All in all amazing game. Great work Dev team

Fun game, although there is pretty strong pressure to purchase upgrades to complete missions after an hour or so of gameplay. Two stars because the "crown" reward. System does not work. As it should. Several tasks were completed for rewards and the reward never showed up. In fact, the reward mysteriously disappeared from my queue. Feels fishy to me...

There are offers for getting crowns by installing and and reaching some points in other games. Even though I completed them I never got the crowns. Furthermore the game is repetitive and absolutely unreliant on any kind of skill. The one thats further ahead in their build tree is the winner 99% when battling. The enjoyment this game hast to offer dwindles, when comparing this game to similar ones like lords mobile or forge of empires

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

6121 Hollis Street
Emeryville CA 94608
United States

- Mystery Chests will automatically open and add their contents to your inventory after 30 Days.
- Baltimore Fencibles now deploys 1x Engineer and 2x Artillery
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

It's true it's a speed thing more than a spelling test. So if you're ancient, like me, it Does help the ol brain box think faster.

It is the ever best game of mine. We can learn here many things . Before exam or test all the teachers regularly saying that you must learn all the difficult spellings.  It will help us . So my appeal to all the people who want to make their brain very intelligent  . So please install this attractive game .

Way too many ads, for one thing. Also, since I'm a pretty good speller and move through the various games rather quickly, I feel that the listed "Top 20" scores are unrealistic, some reaching 5 to 6 figures. Can someone explain this to me?
Not bad. Confusing Leaderboard tho. Have to actually move your eye muscles to look for the right name or time of when you played.  Damn I sound like my brother!!

It is a fun game, in fact the game ideas are phenomenal. However, the ads pop up while I am actually playing the game. To top that off, every time I try to go back to the games, it repeats the previous game I did or goes into another ad and freezes at the end. Removing the game for those reasons.
description: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases. Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!Go for highscores!Game modes:- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).Scoring & limits: - your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu Features:* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages* 7 different spelling games* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode* Review all the words you played with in each game* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks* Each game is different* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included* A must game for all the spelling bee fans* 100% free full version with no In-App purchasesHave a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!Support links:Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/Email: littlebigplay@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases.

Spelling Master contains 7 different spelling games and highscores gameplay, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game to see who is the true Spelling Master! If you prefer playing with no limits, then check a Practice mode!

Go for highscores!

Game modes:
- One word 2 forms - 2 forms of one word to be shown, choose the correct one!
- Find Misspelled - out of 4 words (3 correct + 1 incorrect) choose the misspelled one!
- Find Correct - out of 4 words (3 misspelled + 1 correct) choose the correct one!
- Which Letter.. - remember a word on screen and then type a letter that lies on position X..!
- Decide - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect!
- Decide & Correct - decide if the word on screen is correct or incorrect and if incorrect choose the correct form!
- Multiple Choice - mark all the correct words!
- Practice - random category with no limits (no lives, no time limit).

Scoring & limits:
- your points depend on your speed, faster you find the answer more points you get
- some puzzles have time limit, some rounds and in all of them you are also limited by number of lives
- you can review points of other people by pressing the star icons in the main menu

Features:

* Entertaining English spelling game for all ages
* 7 different spelling games
* See your overall progress and stats for each game mode
* Review all the words you played with in each game
* Local highscores - storing your best points for each mode
* Global highscores - submit your score and review points of other people from all around the world!
* Share your score via facebook, google+, whatsapp and other social networks
* Each game is different
* Hundreds of most misspelled English words included
* A must game for all the spelling bee fans
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Have a nice time playing our word game Spelling Master and if you like the game and want to support it please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:
Website: http://www.littlebigplay.com/
Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
* Improve your English vocabulary and dictionary
recentChanges: * Added a PRACTICE mode in which you can practice spelling with no limits (no lives, no time limit)
* Please rate and review the game if you want to support it and want to see more and mainly free features. Thank you!
summary: Welcome to a Spelling Master, a new educational word game for all ages!
title: Spelling Master - Free

comments: Everything costs money. You'll be playing then run out of grenades. That'll be 30g. Don't have that? Well enjoy losing until you figure out a way to win. Love this game though. Made a purchase right off for a gun. Then I saw how much grinding is involved for the upgrades. The jump between a level 2 and 3 upgrade? Then the outfits, 2nd and 3rd weapons. Man. Sorry no thank you. This shooter however is very fun but the paywall is so well thought out I am not prepared to drop that kind of money. Learned my lesson losing 1k to Megopolis.

I love the game. the game play itself is very self explanatory, quick and very good fps however, they have scammed me. I spent 12.99 on gbucks, the purchase was confirmed, and right after they asked me if i had liked to submit another card number for another purchase. I recall having credentials on a different prepaid visa card in my notes, so I go look, unfortunately I didn't have the CVS code for it. I go back to the game, it had reloaded but I didn't get my gbucks. I was a little confused as the purchase had been confirmed, and the money was taken off my card. I tried contacting them 3 separate times about it but obviously they aren't vigilant of their customers and don't take them as a priority. I recommend playing the game but avoid spending money on it. If I could get some help and get a refund on my card, or the gbucks I originally paid for, I will give it 5 stars, as I would like to.

I love this game so much. I have been looking for a good shooting game for years and I never found one until I came across this. This is perfect. Me and my friend would spend hours on this game. I have been playing this for about 6 months now. It's perfect. I think the best thing about this game is how organized everything is. It is very self explanatory. I found everything and it was easy to do so. I also love how they update this game very often. Great game. I haven't had any problems with it. I can't wait for updates later on to come.

Great game with a lot of potential.... There can be so many more additions to make this fps better. More grenade varieties? A spectator mode? Clan levels that allow more players to join when we reacher higher levels? Gun balancing changes? I feel like the Cerberus should be buffed. It is expensive, and the 3 shots at once doesn't allow for many attempts for kills. Adventure mode for more gunbucks? Death match option? Allowing us to pick the map? I understand the game is fairly new, so keep on adding changes and new improvements. Thanks for listening!

Great game to play, fun and exciting. But not F2P friendly. P2W guns will always be better and it's near impossible to get end games gear for F2P. But still bearable for F2P. My advice would be maintain F2P take it as a grindy F2P games and don't spend any money. It seems this game had an issue that you might not get the item you paid for. You will be charged and not receiving the item and when you try to contact the support. Oh boy... No body will be replying. It seems it's a trend here where there take your money and kick you out.

Game is really tooo gud, graphics also nice n smooth controls but u guys released only one game mode(Team death match), but in lot of fps games they provided free for all, bomb mode, Flag capture n many more modes.. If u guys also provide  like that then ur game gonna be top in fps games üòÄ n mainly  not much places only 3-4... try to add more places n increase the area Size for more fun n more Dodge , now game look like playing in a pocket u guys need to increase area.
description: ‚úî ‚ÄúA brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10‚Äù ‚Äî PocketGamer‚úî ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.‚Äù ‚Äî Android and Me‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before ‚Äì it‚Äôs a legitimately great shooter on mobile.‚Äù ‚Äî Droid Gamers‚úî ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.‚Äù ‚Äî AndroidCommunity‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.‚Äù ‚Äî 148Apps‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!‚Ä¢ Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!‚Ä¢ Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.‚Ä¢ Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! ‚Ä¢ Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!‚Ä¢ Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain‚Äôt no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won‚Äôt fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢¬†Two event exclusive Guns ‚Äî unleash the inner dragon!
‚Ä¢¬†New festive Customization: Costumes, Masks, Insignias, and Weapon Skins
‚Ä¢ New Currency: Tokens‚Äîthe better you fight, the more you get
‚Ä¢¬†Daily Rankings and overall Event Rating‚Äîget cool prizes for your skill every day.
‚Ä¢¬†Hardcore Challenges‚Äîa chance for the best players to earn the unique Dragon Warrior costume.
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: Great game. First turn based strategy game that I have enjoyed in a long time. There is no dumb energy bar that you have to wait to refill which is amazing.  Also there are no ads unless you voluntarily watch one to get a bonus to a chest. The only thing I wish was different is that the player could unlock multiple chest at once. It's quite slow to open chests as it is and it would be awesome to be able to unlock more chests at the same time. Overall it's a great game with a bright future. I would definitely recommend getting it.

Just downloaded. Like what I see so far and can play casually. No ads interfering with game play. Hope to see some strategic maps in the future. I'll change my review once I get to know the game better. This is definitely NOT one of those ridiculous grindfest mobile games. There's gaming consoles and PC's for that nonsense.
I just installed your f game and i give you this rewiew. I dont know how much you pay for your adds but your game sucks!!!

The concept is great, and I love the idea you put into it. Id continue playing more if there were a few tweaks done. It took 5 minutes (literally) to match up to someone who didn't fight (not a *bot* we get to fight in the beginning) as well as take a minute each to unlock a 15s chest...  Otherwise its nice!
I do enjoy this game, however there needs to have a few more features, a story mode would do great, as i can see so much potential with the sensos having their own story
I wasn't able to end my first turn in the games tutorial.

I think this is a great game to pass time but the planes are just to expensive. I passed all levels with in 2 days.  It's now time to uninstall and look for another game with less expensive planes.
You only get one plane. You have to buy every single other plane. This is garbage. At Least have 3 planes to fly! This is ridiculous. Deleted it after 20 seconds

comments: Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!

This is by far one of the best choices games I think I've ever played the graphics and animation is absolutely second to non, the story so far seems awesome and intriguing. The animation is beautiful and smooth and runs well on my phone. Please never change the way this game is. It gives you the option to buy things but it is very fair to those who can't pay due to money issues so I would definitely recommend this game. The developers should be proud of this game because it really is beautiful designed and made you can tell alot of care and effort went into perfecting this game. It's worth the wait on each episode, I love the stats from other players feature and how you can go back for free to see how different choices would of effect the game differently. All round a very professionally well built game 10 out of 10 wish I could give it more stars it deserves more than 5 :D.
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
If she will be with Rodrigo again, Im not playing this anymore. This drama is so boring. No matter what I do, she will always choose Rodrigo. I want her with Bruno !
keeps  me interested and so disappointed to have to wait for more tickets and gems so they get my money but gotta make a living from your talents some how

comments: l was enjoying the game a lot and would have given it 5 stars. l spent a long time to get enough bricks to  build a level 7 home so dragons only needed 7 mins sleep.. NOW    only  the same 5 of my 30 dragons get out and this is making collecting bricks and healing power very slow. l have not seen all my green dragons and moon dragons( the hardest workers) for 2 days now. developers please help or l will stop playing. TY.

I would love to give this game 5 stars but 99% of the ground I've uncovered is covered by "treasure chests" and there's no way to get rid of them or contact the game makers for help. I've completely run out of space and can't play anymore. The chests should disappear after 3 - 5 days if they're not opened.

Love this game. Graphics are great and so much to do. Keeps me going for ages. Main concern and the reason I've not rated 5 star is the time it takes to get each token. When some levels take 7 and it takes half a day to fill up it's a major pain. Then you do a level that needs 4 and the next also 4 it takes the p*ss. Would be great to have a higher limit without getting charged or for them to fill up quicker. If this was done I would rate 5 star all round.

2/5 stars because the only way to play the game is by paying! You can either pay to remove "pay to open" boxes or they don't go away taking up all your space! It takes 1 hr for your chalices (energy) to refill only 1 and you only get 7. Love the concept of the game and it is very unique but make it so that people can actually play. Get sponsors, play some ads, have the boxes disappear after a certain amount of time, ANYYHING! This is b*lls*it and not everyone has money to throw away on games. Fix it or I keep the rating low.

Playing this game makes me lose track of time. Wish we could buy the dragon egg chests with game coins.  That would be greatly helpful. Please consider this. Also would be great to transfer items from other levels back to the camp, like eggs, flowers, etc. Plz have this feature.Thanks. Plus would help if there was a set button to hit to exit the game. I am finding it takes between a few to about 5 times to hit the back button on my tablet. Plz fix, would make things alot quicker.

Buggy.  The game itself was pretty good but there are issues with the cloud save deleting peoples games + all their in-app purchases (like me). The support for the game is non-existent. They have one email address to send issues to, and it's been weeks, almost a month, since and there has been no response. So everything is gone and they can't be bothered to try and restore my account for a month.   In short, it was fun and addictive, but your game will delete itself eventually and the support staff doesn't care since they already have your money.
description: Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching! In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:== Match Objects ==‚Ä¢ Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.‚Ä¢ Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!‚Ä¢ Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!‚Ä¢ Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!‚Ä¢ Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level‚Äôs cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==‚Ä¢ Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!‚Ä¢ Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.== Tricky Puzzles ==‚Ä¢ Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!‚Ä¢ Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!‚Ä¢ Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?‚Ä¢ On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom

summary: Match everything in your world to create life and heal the land!
title: Merge Dragons!

Pick up passengers as a taxi driver, race your way carefully in traffic and drop off passengers at the next bus stop. The more passengers you transport, the more gold you earn!

comments: This game took me by surprise when i started playing it. I didn't expect much from the screenshots,  and was on a game-finding-rage-fueled hunt (last 3 games I've tried i didn't even review because they were that horrid.) But this games, my my,  this game. It doesn't pop up ads you don't want EVER, game play may be a bit repetitive,  but it's challenging. None, i repeat, NONE, of the bosses are cheese gimmick ones.  They all have strategy. I could go on forever, but try this yourself! You'll love it.

Love it! Basically a lot from what I love about the combat in the Souls series in a mobile form. It is an amazing game with a pretty good soundtrack. Plus it's progression is simple and satisfying. I did find a bug though, when I beat Murmur for the second time I think I killed him when he was about to attack, not sure, and then he lost his health bar, I lost mine, like the game was transitioning to the next area but it never did. The game was softlocked and I had to close it. Small bug, nothing to worry about, but should be fixed.

I'm writing this and haven't yet get past lvl 1!... My point is that u'll fall in love with this game just in the first few seconds. The concept, how you level up, the art style, etc.. all make a very robust and well thought game. Bravo developer... pls make more of this

I love it. Also... The part where it says "I will kill you" Can you PLEASE ADD A STORY TO WHY! AND if here is a Prequel to it... Please lemme know! The controls are hard at start but later it gets amazing! And of course! Stay Snazzy!!

I love this game, one of my favourites by far. Although some aspects can be improved I give it five stars because it gives me hours of fun and is really easy to enjoy it. The only aspects that could be improved are the enemy combos, ones you memorized the combos, the game is way too easy.

When I first saw this, it looked kinda boring. I decided to give it a look, and, oh my god, I don't think I've ever been this wrong. The game is fast paced, fun, and never feels stale. The perfect game for you if you enjoy difficult but rewarding fast paced combat.

Now is the time to hunt them back...with the dark power from the curse...'

You must continue to kill evils to guard your soul from demonic force taking over you...

[Notice]
* If you can not select items after purchasing items, please go to Settings> Restore Purchase.
Please contact us by email if you can not

* Final Boss Stage!
- Meet Baal, the ultimate boss on 400 kills
- Finally you'll find out what happened with Elise

*Your data now can be saved!
- Title Scene > OPTION > 'SAVE/LOAD' Btn.
- Save often to save yourself ;D


[Game Features]

◈ DEVIL MUST DIE!
Punish the devils and purify 5 cities!

◈ Sensitive action system
Counter Attack : Counter the enemy's attack by guarding JUST in time!
SkillShot : Bust away the devils in a sweep!

◈ Selective leveling
- Train your hunter : Train hunter and upgrade various offensive/defensive skills and speed!
- Weapon Shop : Variety of demonic pistols with different skills!
- Buy costumes with Skills!


[Bugs or Optimization Problems]

◈ Laggy on most 512 Ram devices
◈ Has mysterious crash bug at start. We're trying to resolve ASAP but little clue. Sorry!

◈ Free Gold Offer wall's first offer may need additional treat to load
- After the very first offer completion, reward may not be loaded instantly.
- In such case, please reopen and close the Free Gold offer wall, and your gold offer will be loaded.
summary: Kill evils to guard your soul from demonic force taking over you!
title: Devil Eater

description: Welcome to the world of Castle Burn, a real-time strategy game set in a land of fantasy where you face off against others in PvP combat! You want magic, towers, Vikings, and dragons? We've got 'em all!  Lead your heroes' to victory and burn your rivals' castles to the ground!In Castle Burn, you will become master of your own army and lead your troops into battle against others in the Crown League. Construct camps and mana sanctums as you expand your territory, and utilize all the cards in your hand to eliminate those who stand between you and the crown! You say you've never played a game like this before? Not to worry! Anyone can come out on top in the league and claim the throne for their own!Assemble your deck in real-time! After adding a unit card to your deck, you can deploy the corresponding unit onto the battlefield. Tower cards can be used to construct towers that will defend against incoming foes, and spell cards can be used to throw your enemy for a loop! Adapt your strategies in real-time to topple your opponent and emerge victorious!Expand your strategic options by upgrading your castle's tier! Once you add a second and fourth card to your deck, your castle's upgrade will begin and you'll be able to add even higher tier cards to destroy your opponents with!Use your hero to turn the tide of battle in your favor! Each hero possess unique skills that increase in strength each time your castle is upgraded. Although heroes are already strong by themselves, they really shine when used in conjunction with other units. Learn the specific attributes of each hero so you can better utilize your own while more easily defeating the enemy's hero!Track down your enemy in the fog! Scouting the map is essential to prepare yourself for your opponent's attacks. You can use the Return command to call your units and hero back to your castle. Units will return a portion of the cost used to deploy them, and heroes will begin to recover HP. You can always cancel your units' return before they reach the castle, so don't be afraid to use it to keep your army safe while scouting.Win ranked matches to advance to higher leagues! As you do, you will obtain Crown Points, as well as new cards and maps! At the end of each season, you will receive rewards based on the league you made it to. If you ever think you need more practice, you can always join casual matches, where you won't lose any Crown Points, or try some training against the game's AI.Complete quests to get card packs! Numerous quests are available to appease even the most ambitious players! You can also get card packs by winning ranked matches, so make sure to build up your collection and level up your cards!Keep track of your battle log! Your most recent records are saved in the Battle Records menu. You can watch replays to study up on opponents' strategies and come up with ideas for your next battle. You can also view the battle records of the top 100 players and others in your league via the Rankings menu. Develop advanced strategies by taking notes on what others are doing well and examining your own performance!Look for Castle Burn on social media! You can catch past streams from one of our developers, a former pro-gamer, or you can share your own battles on Youtube, Facebook, Twitter, and Everyplay! Show your friends some of your most triumphant victories!- Castle Burn requires the following app permissions on Android 6.0 or higher to play:READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for various game settings and for loading the cache.- Revoking App PermissionsAndroid 6.0 and up: Settings > Application Manager > (Select app) > Permissions > (Turn off)Below Android 6.0: Delete the app, as permissions cannot be revokedCustomer SupportWithin the game, go to Mail > Query > Select a Category > Write your message > SendVisit the Castle Burn website for news and tips   - https://www.castleburn.net/home

Welcome to the world of Castle Burn, a real-time strategy game set in a land of fantasy where you face off against others in PvP combat! You want magic, towers, Vikings, and dragons? We've got 'em all! Lead your heroes' to victory and burn your rivals' castles to the ground!

In Castle Burn, you will become master of your own army and lead your troops into battle against others in the Crown League. Construct camps and mana sanctums as you expand your territory, and utilize all the cards in your hand to eliminate those who stand between you and the crown! You say you've never played a game like this before? Not to worry! Anyone can come out on top in the league and claim the throne for their own!

Assemble your deck in real-time! After adding a unit card to your deck, you can deploy the corresponding unit onto the battlefield. Tower cards can be used to construct towers that will defend against incoming foes, and spell cards can be used to throw your enemy for a loop! Adapt your strategies in real-time to topple your opponent and emerge victorious!

Expand your strategic options by upgrading your castle's tier! Once you add a second and fourth card to your deck, your castle's upgrade will begin and you'll be able to add even higher tier cards to destroy your opponents with!

Use your hero to turn the tide of battle in your favor! Each hero possess unique skills that increase in strength each time your castle is upgraded. Although heroes are already strong by themselves, they really shine when used in conjunction with other units. Learn the specific attributes of each hero so you can better utilize your own while more easily defeating the enemy's hero!

Track down your enemy in the fog! Scouting the map is essential to prepare yourself for your opponent's attacks. You can use the Return command to call your units and hero back to your castle. Units will return a portion of the cost used to deploy them, and heroes will begin to recover HP. You can always cancel your units' return before they reach the castle, so don't be afraid to use it to keep your army safe while scouting.

Win ranked matches to advance to higher leagues! As you do, you will obtain Crown Points, as well as new cards and maps! At the end of each season, you will receive rewards based on the league you made it to. If you ever think you need more practice, you can always join casual matches, where you won't lose any Crown Points, or try some training against the game's AI.

Complete quests to get card packs! Numerous quests are available to appease even the most ambitious players! You can also get card packs by winning ranked matches, so make sure to build up your collection and level up your cards!

Keep track of your battle log! Your most recent records are saved in the Battle Records menu. You can watch replays to study up on opponents' strategies and come up with ideas for your next battle. You can also view the battle records of the top 100 players and others in your league via the Rankings menu. Develop advanced strategies by taking notes on what others are doing well and examining your own performance!

Look for Castle Burn on social media! You can catch past streams from one of our developers, a former pro-gamer, or you can share your own battles on Youtube, Facebook, Twitter, and Everyplay! Show your friends some of your most triumphant victories!

- Castle Burn requires the following app permissions on Android 6.0 or higher to play:

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for various game settings and for loading the cache.

- Revoking App Permissions
Android 6.0 and up: Settings > Application Manager > (Select app) > Permissions > (Turn off)
Below Android 6.0: Delete the app, as permissions cannot be revoked


Customer Support
Within the game, go to Mail > Query > Select a Category > Write your message > Send

Visit the Castle Burn website for news and tips
- https://www.castleburn.net/home

Experience new cards early in casual matches!

Refine your skills in the practice arena, take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches, or enter tournaments to win trophies and exclusive cues!

PLAY FOR POOL COINS AND EXCLUSIVE ITEMS

Customize your cue and table! In every competitive 1-vs-1 match you play, there’ll be Pool Coins at stake – win the match and the Coins are yours. You can use these to enter higher ranked matches with bigger stakes, or to buy new items in the Pool Shop.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS

Playing friends is easy: sign in with your Miniclip or Facebook account and you’ll be able to challenge your friends straight from the game. Challenge friends anytime, anywhere and show off your skills.

LEVEL UP

8 Ball Pool’s level system means you’re always facing a challenge. Play matches to increase your ranking and get access to more exclusive match locations, where you play against only the best Pool players.

--Download Pool by Miniclip NOW!--
*This game requires internet connection.

comments: Amazing game if you like naval warships. UPDATE: As of Feb 17 2018, the new update has seriously increased the game content and fun level. UPDATE as of Feb 27 2018, Lowered my rating to 4 stars because there is a constant issue with the timers or something like that.  I login and collect the crate and start a module upgrading then login several hours late and is like no time elapsed in the game from the last time I logged in. This has happened several times in the past as well.

Best battleship game on Android hands down ! Better than wargaming ship game great controls great graphics !Fun to play good selection of warships and large maps and they keep on doing updates to keep it interesting! And the most important thing is the price of ships are fair keep up the great work . I love the last update with graphics and maps and ships. the only thing the Bismarck is under powered can you make her stronger because she was the pride of Germany and everybody complains she is not a good ship.She is a powerhouse thank you!

Definitely a good game and worth your time and money. Only issue that developers really need to attend to is how they select the team. You can't have 7 ships of high ranks against 5 or 4 ships of low rank. It makes a person want to delete the game even after spending money on it. Keep same ranked players together in a battle. Really irritating.

Fact need a good connection to keep control of your ships Now, I have plenty of $$$ nothing to spend on it. Waiting to get the last max destroyer ship i can get on the random container spin.  Also noted... I open up the app the next day and the container count down says 2+ hours. It should read 0 zero I would think.

This is a fantastic game one of the best by miles. I am not sure however, that the latest update was such a success. Prior to update the smaller torpedo boats had a good chance now that dynamic has been removed by the dominance of the larger ships firepower and slow reload times on torpedoes.  This means that the strategic component has been somewhat diminished

look since the update the game constantly resarts when trying to enter battle.....  now I just had my tablet lock up for a half hour....  the chat in this game has killed it.... constantly getting the game  restarted..... booting back to desktop. I have been playing for over a year with iowa and new Jersey completely maxed...  its sad to see the quality go down
description: Battle of Warships is one of the legendary mobile game about battleship and naval warfare. Navigate your unique ships that used in the WW1 and WW2. Improve on your own ship, increase health points, engine speed and turns. Customize navy army with the flag of your country. Get daily rewards, level up your skills and ship's characteristics. Become the God of War and war thunder with warship craft, battle with enemy for war and order. Try to blitz with artillery enemy‚Äôs airplane and jet wings. FEATURES:‚ú´ More than 20 unique battleships including the most legendary ones of the World War 1 and World War 2!YAMATO, Missouri, Bismarck, South Dakota and even Aircraft carrier (it includes air planes and jet)! Choose your destiny! Be commando of all of them in our ship games!‚ú´ A unique  update system for each ship of yoursHuge numbers of different weapons for improving your ship such as torpedoes, interceptors, missiles and so on for your battleship craft!‚ú´ Latest 3D graphics, corresponding to all the characteristics of the best mobile game!Super realistic boat gunship battle graphics, exquisitely crafted with attention to the smallest details for wwi and ww2 games genre.‚ú´ Touch control & several versions, including the gyroscope!Totally easy and intuitive control, just put weapons on enemy and push SHOT! descriptionHTML:
Battle of Warships is one of the legendary mobile game about battleship and naval warfare. Navigate your unique ships that used in the WW1 and WW2. Improve on your own ship, increase health points, engine speed and turns. Customize navy army with the flag of your country. Get daily rewards, level up your skills and ship's characteristics. Become the God of War and war thunder with warship craft, battle with enemy for war and order. Try to blitz with artillery enemy’s airplane and jet wings.

FEATURES:

✫ More than 20 unique battleships including the most legendary ones of the World War 1 and World War 2!
YAMATO, Missouri, Bismarck, South Dakota and even Aircraft carrier (it includes air planes and jet)! Choose your destiny! Be commando of all of them in our ship games!

✫ A unique update system for each ship of yours
Huge numbers of different weapons for improving your ship such as torpedoes, interceptors, missiles and so on for your battleship craft!

✫ Latest 3D graphics, corresponding to all the characteristics of the best mobile game!
Super realistic boat gunship battle graphics, exquisitely crafted with attention to the smallest details for wwi and ww2 games genre.

✫ Touch control & several versions, including the gyroscope!
Totally easy and intuitive control, just put weapons on enemy and push SHOT! Art of game that’s all you need to win in WW army games. Victory day not far off!

✫ Weather change system on the game maps! Fight day & night!
Rain, sun, sunset and even snow. What kind of weather do you prefer in military games?

✫ Massive world battlefield area
Mountains and glaciers will be your companions in this navy games fleet!

BoW is war games genre multiplayer games ocean wars simulator. Our war games is totally FREE for download.

description: Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft! Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper! Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design  items to make the most unique interior design ever!Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant! Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala! Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a  french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!Craft & BuildSimply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!Play MinigamesPlay minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you! Meet the peopleUse internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend! Explore the infinite worldYou can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it‚Äôs your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!Become an interior and exterior designerUse one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design! Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!
descriptionHTML:
Build your own blocky Eiffel Tower, Louvre and the Moulin Rouge! Meet the french people, visit museums and explore the capital of France! Build & Craft! Ultimate crafting games for boys and girls - only in Paris Craft!

Sandbox is a type of game, where you can explore the infinite blocky world! Create buildings using blocks and become the ultimate builder! Create a Paris from the scratch! Use blocks to build and unleash your creativity! Build anything! From a cottage house to a skyscraper!

Craft items and use them to decorate your apartment in Paris. Become an interior designer - the french style! Design the wallpapers, place the furnishing like tables, chairs etc. Craft & design items to make the most unique interior design ever!

Use chat to pick up girls and boys (love story craft - you chat with computer bot - not real people!), date french girls or handsome boys! Take them to a romantic dinner in a french restaurant!

Drive cars, motorcycles or just go to a theme park! Ride blocky animals, meet the people and have your own pet (from cat and dog to a parrot or elephant!) Visit cafes, pastry shops and monuments! Meet french artists! Visit the Paris Zoo and play with cute animals such as Panda or Coala!

Become the citizen of a Square Paris! The city of art, love and awesome food! Pop in to a french pastry shop, go for shopping to a shopping centre or arrange your own wedding in the most beautiful city of Europe! Crafting, building and exploration of city of love! No need for Paris guide!

Craft & Build
Simply use blocks to create structures. Add or remove blocks to construct anything! Build a whole city! Over 300 different blocks are ready to unleash your creativity!

Play Minigames
Play minigames to enjoy your time in Paris even more. Pick up some girls and boys andhave fun! Casino, dancing and singing rhythm minigames are waiting for you!

Meet the people
Use internal chat mode to pick up girls and boys, date and have fun! Remember - you are not talking to a real person only to a computer bot! You can have your virtual french boyfriend or girlfriend!

Explore the infinite world
You can travel anywhere you want! Use cars, metro, trains or even planes and helicopter! The world is infinite! You can ride horse or ride a bike - it’s your choice. Simply craft one of the items and use it!

Become an interior and exterior designer
Use one of over 200 items to prepare the most awesome interior design of your french mansion! Chairs, tables, drawers, desks! Design the kitchen, design the bathroom and become the legend of a interior design!

Paris Craft - one of the best crafting & building games of 2018. PLAY NOW!

description: Do the life in the city make you breathless?Do the noisy of machinery makes you uncomfortable?What are you waiting for? Let me escape from the noisy of life in the city! Enter the peaceful farmland and enjoy yourself in the fun! descriptionHTML:
Do the life in the city make you breathless?
Do the noisy of machinery makes you uncomfortable?

What are you waiting for? Let me escape from the noisy of life in the city! Enter the peaceful farmland and enjoy yourself in the fun! There are so many amazing things waiting for you to discover at Dream Farm !!

Main features:
+ Cultivation: With more than 20 types of plants, gradually opening up at each level will never make you curious about the next plants and the interesting things they bring.
+ Livestock: alone farm management will be lonely? You were wrong when it came to Dream Farm. With so many pets of all kinds, the funny, cute sounds of their love will make you melt, never to leave the moment. What is the number of pets? I bet you will not be surprised!
+ Factory: A prosperous farm is a modern farm that can produce anything you want! How do you want your farm to grow? Is Asia's leading confectionery and bakery producing country? Be a famous farm in the field of pure European milk ... ... and a lot of development of the farm depends on the choice on you!
Natural Resources: One thing that brings Dream Farm's difference to other farms is natural resources. Do not miss them, these resources will determine the prosperity of the farm. Remember one thing is to protect nature, do not over-exploit.
Everything will be yours after a click. Try a relaxed life on the farm such as vegetables, fruit trees, milking cows, cutting fleece!

Develop your farm into a Farm in Dreams!
summary: Dream farm game and more. Leaving the city to experience farming farmer's life.
title: Dream Farm

description: In this terrifying map for Minecraft you have a unique possibility not only to find yourself in the unusual and creepy world of the popular horror-game, but to play for one of its characters too. If you‚Äôre ready to test your nerves, download our new MCPE map for free and imagine yourself a hero of the famous horror-game!In this map for Minecraft you can choose a character, for whom you want to play, and you can a choice of four main heroes: Bendy, Boris, Joe and Henry. As soon as you make a decision, you will get a chest with different unusual things, which will be definitely very useful during the game. Each hero of this map for MCPE has its own plotline and, that‚Äôs why things in the chest are completely different, because every character will face special dangers and numerous obstacles. But, nevertheless, no matter whom will you choose, each of this four characters of this exciting map for Minecraft has to go through the maze, avoiding treacherous traps and creepy places, in order to save his/her life and find the way out of this dangerous place. Except this main aim, every character has their own special tasks, which you need to complete too. All action in this map for Minecraft is going on the dark wooden maze, consisting of numerous mazy corridors, cells and creepy places. If you‚Äôre not scared, and you‚Äôre ready to dive into terrifying world of Bendy and his friends, download our new map for Minecraft for free, and try to survive in this dangerous world of horror-game!You will need to install Minecraft Pocket Edition on your mobile device for this map.DISCLAIMER: This map for MCPE isn‚Äôt made or supported by Mojang. descriptionHTML:
~~> Fall in love with your high school crush, in this love story game! Flirt, date, & dress to impress in the most stylish outfits!
~~> Be the Prom Queen & dance with your date! Mix & match moves to create your own real-life dance routines - the combinations are endless!
~~> Earn popularity points & become the most popular girl in high school! You go girl!

Get ready for an amazing high school love story! There’s a cute new guy at school & rumor has it he has a crush on you! Flirt with him in the cafeteria & make him blush! What, did he just ask you to prom?! Are you in love? Glam up at the spa, add a touch of makeup and BAM - you look HOT! Dance the night away & have a ball - you only go to high school once, after all. Make your high school experience the love story of a lifetime!

Features:
> Dress up for the first day of school! Choose from tons of stylish clothing at the mall!
> Flirt with really cute boys in the cafeteria! Does your crush like you back?! Let’s make your love story dreams come true!
> Choreograph dances at Prom! Choose from tons of real-life dance moves!
> Collect hearts & earn popularity points! Become the most popular girl in school!
> Makeover time - choose from tons of makeup items, style your hair & more!
> Pamper yourself at the spa - get a cleaning facial so you feel fresh!
> Get your nails done at the Nail Salon - file, paint & design nail art!
> Strike a pose! Pose for your glam shot before Prom!
> Be the star of the school newspaper (and of your own love story)! Everyone is talking about YOU!

ABOUT Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading global creator and publisher of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.
