descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

Room 735, 7/F, Run Run Shaw Tower Centennial Campus
Pokfulam Road, Hong Kong, China

summary: Play like a kid, fight like a man!
title: Army Men Strike

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

I kind of enjoy the game but would like it more if there were cheaper options to buying. After you buy some the prices jump to 99.99 and have yet to see cheaper prices. I'm not unloading that in one go. The people of this game would probably make more money if they bring cheaper prices. I would buy several different little packs that eventually add up to 100 bit you ain't getting nothing otherwise. Also wish you could buy more things with the gold you purchased. Like have a choice to spend loyalty or gold

Please understand that there is really nothing free about this game except the install. While the gameplay WAS very promising at first, purchaseable bonus packs take any strategy completely out of the game. Now, in addition, each new element of the game that has been released in recent weeks requires cash to unlock. I can only use about half of the games features now. Bummer. If you're willing to pay, have a blast with this game. Otherwise leave it alone!

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.
description: Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. descriptionHTML:
Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends!

Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire is a mobile adventure that lets you rewrite a favorite classic to fulfill your unique destiny. description: You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.Good luck to you free game.
descriptionHTML:
You have to play the character Stickman, who was put in jail. Your task is to find two successful ways of escape with the use of crafting. Kraft should be at every step, so as not to become a victim of guards and dangerous creatures.
In the prison chamber of, you will have a box of chest, which will contain the necessary ingredients for crafting. Use different blocks, weapons and wit to make a successful escape from prison.
Among the monsters you will see zombies, spiders, dragons, wild horses and many other characters and monsters. Also you will see different weapons, among them there will be a sword, a pickaxe, dynamite and more.
The game will encounter various switches, and portals, with which you can travel. Also in the game there are mini games that diversify the whole game process. For example, in one mini-game you have to climb up a large tree, avoiding spines. In another mini-game you have to work with different blocks to build a solid bridge and pass it.
Good luck to you free game.

descriptionHTML:
Magic Kinder - Educational App

Magic Kinder is a world of fun and education designed to help families play and learn together through engaging games, activities, videos and stories in a safe environment.
Play is vital to children’s growth and development and Magic Kinder is designed to deliver learning opportunities through fun and engaging content.
Magic Kinder is completely FREE! There are no ads, no subscription required and no in-app purchases.
And we help parents too! Magic Kinder also contains videos and activities to help you make the most of your time with your children.
The application does not include any reference to Kinder chocolate products.
The physical toy surprises are the only reference to the product. No chocolate is shown!

The app includes the following content and features:

SURPRISERY
The Kinder Surprises toys can now be collected digitally in two different ways:
1. Scan the QR code found in the egg and you get to unblock the same surprise or a random one.
2. Through the ‘surprise of the day’, a random Kinder Surprise toy is unlocked.

PLAY & LEARN
If you are looking for fun games and activities for your child, then the playzone is the right place. It has multiplayer games for 3-10 year old kids geared towards improving children’s educational and cognitive development by focusing on various skills such as perception, attention, visual, motor and problem solving skills.
A selection of the games is focused on various topics such as: music, nursery rhymes, math and language. All designed towards being fun and playful.
Depending on countries and date, Magic Kinder also includes games and activities from some of the most popular characters: Despicable Me, Barbie, Hello Kitty, The Happos Family, Oddbods, Care Bears and much more.

WATCH VIDEOS
New videos are added frequently and they include: tutorials to do together as a family, cartoons, stop motion episodes, documentaries and more. Some of the activities include:
Karaoke Style Sing and dance along videos
Recipe and crafting tutorials to do together with your children dedicated to different festivities around the world like Halloween, Christmas, Easter, Chinese New Year, Ramadan and Diwali
Physical activity tutorials for the whole family
Cartoons and documentaries
Stop-motion videos featuring the Kinder egg surprise toys

DISCOVER THE PLANET
Through a collection of quizzes, facts and curiosities your child can learn about our planet and its wonders, explore nature and the animal world

DRAW & PAINT
Amazing New Feature: Bring your kids' creations to life through Augmented Reality! This functionality enables children to see their colored animals in 3D and interact with them. They will also repeat what your child says.

STORIES
A selection of fun and interactive bedtime stories.
USE THE APP OFFLINE - most of e content is available also without an internet connection
Magic Kinder is certified by the kidSAFE® Seal Program. To learn more, visit http://www.kidsafeseal.com

PARENT SECTION
A pin-protected zone is available for parents to manage the account, personalise and set time limits giving you control over your child's usage of the app.
If you wish to contact us, please do so through contact@magic-kinder.com
If you have any questions regarding the privacy policy please write to privacy@ferrero.com

IMAGINATION is the REAL SURPRISE!

Ferrero Trading Lux S.A.
Findel Business Center - Complexe B, Rue de Tr√®ves
L-2632 Findel, Luxembourg
summary: Magic Kinder - Free Kids Games, Bedtime Stories, Fun Videos & Other Surprises
title: Magic Kinder Official App - Free Kids Games

The user has to invade all modern war zones in the world like Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria, Columbia, Mexico and Africa. description: The sights and smells at the carnival keep you coming back year after year. Your nose leads you to the best fair food. It's time to get cooking up some tasty street food at your local carnival!Street food is easy to eat on the go, and just makes sense for carnivals and fairs, but why not get to make it all the time? Let's get cooking to see how many different carnival favorites you can make. Be sure that you have all the right ingredients, and get started cooking up the best food around. Think you can surprise your friends and family with some amazing dishes? Try it out today! These great looking foods might just get your mouthwatering to really make some street food at home.How to Play:- Pick a tasty carnival treat to cook up- Gather the ingredients- Get cooking!- Can you make the best fair food to beat all the other vendors?The carnival is in town and has gotten you in the mood for all kinds of yummy fair food. You should get cooking at home some of your street food favorites! Your friends and family will love the smells coming from your kitchen! Download today to start cooking up some fun!
descriptionHTML:
The sights and smells at the carnival keep you coming back year after year. Your nose leads you to the best fair food. It's time to get cooking up some tasty street food at your local carnival!

Street food is easy to eat on the go, and just makes sense for carnivals and fairs, but why not get to make it all the time? Let's get cooking to see how many different carnival favorites you can make. Be sure that you have all the right ingredients, and get started cooking up the best food around. Think you can surprise your friends and family with some amazing dishes? Try it out today! These great looking foods might just get your mouthwatering to really make some street food at home.

How to Play:
- Pick a tasty carnival treat to cook up
- Gather the ingredients
- Get cooking!
- Can you make the best fair food to beat all the other vendors?

The carnival is in town and has gotten you in the mood for all kinds of yummy fair food. You should get cooking at home some of your street food favorites! Your friends and family will love the smells coming from your kitchen! Download today to start cooking up some fun!

comments: Players are bailing from this game like crazy. My clan has lost nearly all the higher level players, most from leaving the game. So the clan is all low level players who can't contribute as much. Arena player's list shows everyone but the top 3 not playing all week. A ton of other issues that you can find in any ABE forum and even in the comments on posts on the ABE Facebook page. I think Rovio's stock trend shows it all.

This use to be my favorite game. Have spent alot of money playing. Due to the "white out" have not been able to play for 3 months. Even after several updates, nothing. Tech support claims to be on the issue... Very frustrating!!!!

I used to love this game, but the changes make me HATE it now. Like it's so hard to get a premium hatch ticket now, yet y'all still throw two star and three star Birds in there. The Halloween event is impossible with the numbers set so high, and the amount of skulls you receive in a battle is 5-10 max. This game has become a money pit, and I think I'm out. Rovio got greedy, and I don't appreciate it. You ruined the game for sure

OK. So, it started off fun. But, now all I get is lost connection, slow connection or some other BS! I'm not going to be able to get any further because I won't pay for stuff. So, it's going to be uninstalled. Of you must, play for a week, then ditch it
The game keeps closing during play causing player's to loose prizes and money. It's having more problems with every update. Support staff are pretty useless when reporting glitches.

More or less meh, can do with or without. Asks frequently if you enjoy the app, if you say "no" then that's it. However, only if you say "yes" will it ask you to rate it. Pathetic that the developers don't actually want feedback. Needs some smoothing out on a few things, but Rovio doesn't care.

descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.


This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

summary: Build an unstoppable flock.
title: Angry Birds Evolution

description: Kindergarten Fun is a fun educational game for preschool kids. This app has been developed to improve Visual Spatial Skills, Problem Solving Skills, Cognitive Skills and confidence through activities such as identifying pictures, words, letters of the alphabet, colours, animals, vehicle names and much more. Kindergarten Fun uses colourful designs, pictures and sounds to make it fun and interactive. On this app, kids can play matching games involving colours, shapes, animals etc. and with touch and trace, it's simple and easy to use!Learning Features: ‚Ä¢ Match a picture and its colour e.g. Tomato -> Red‚Ä¢ Identify shapes from pictures‚Ä¢ Join relative pairs e.g. Socks -> Shoes‚Ä¢ Match an animal to its offspring e.g. Dog -> Puppy‚Ä¢ Complete pairs of missing numbers‚Ä¢ Match capital letters to lowercase letters e.g. A -> a‚Ä¢ Match a number to its word e.g. 4 -> Four‚Ä¢ Calculate simple addition sums and match the answer‚Ä¢ Match an animal to its product e.g. Cow -> Gives us milk‚Ä¢ Match a pair of maths formulas like addition and subtraction.‚Ä¢ Match analogue clock time to digital clock time.‚Ä¢ Make a new word from two pictures e.g. Basket + Ball -> Basketball.‚Ä¢ Fill in the blank e.g.  _AG -> BAG‚Ä¢ Match a pair of opposite words e.g. Hot -> Cold (or another example you have)‚Ä¢ Match rhyming words  e.g. Bug -> Mug‚Ä¢ Match animals to their habitats e.g. Fish -> Sea‚Ä¢ Match the first letter of a word to an image of the word e.g. M -> Monkey‚Ä¢ Match an animal to their food e.g. Monkey -> Banana‚Ä¢ Match an animal to their home e.g. Dog -> KennelApp Features: ‚Ä¢ Listen to the words after a pair has been completed‚Ä¢ Interactive designs and sounds to make playing fun!‚Ä¢ Rewards achievements the more times you play‚Ä¢ Receive a ‚ÄòThumbs Up‚Äô after a lesson has been completed‚Ä¢ Really helpful for learning maths, the number system, the alphabet, words, shapes etc.The levels on the app start easy and get more challenging each time. For example, after successfully identifying simple pairs like shapes and colours, the app will then move onto matching upper case letters to lower case letters, finding missing numbers and letters, addition and much more. We are sure that kids will love and enjoy playing this app!
descriptionHTML:
Kindergarten Fun is a fun educational game for preschool kids. This app has been developed to improve Visual Spatial Skills, Problem Solving Skills, Cognitive Skills and confidence through activities such as identifying pictures, words, letters of the alphabet, colours, animals, vehicle names and much more. Kindergarten Fun uses colourful designs, pictures and sounds to make it fun and interactive. On this app, kids can play matching games involving colours, shapes, animals etc. and with touch and trace, it's simple and easy to use!

Learning Features:
• Match a picture and its colour e.g. Tomato -> Red
• Identify shapes from pictures
• Join relative pairs e.g. Socks -> Shoes
• Match an animal to its offspring e.g. Dog -> Puppy
• Complete pairs of missing numbers
• Match capital letters to lowercase letters e.g. A -> a
• Match a number to its word e.g. 4 -> Four
• Calculate simple addition sums and match the answer
• Match an animal to its product e.g. Cow -> Gives us milk
• Match a pair of maths formulas like addition and subtraction.
• Match analogue clock time to digital clock time.
• Make a new word from two pictures e.g. Basket + Ball -> Basketball.
• Fill in the blank e.g. _AG -> BAG
• Match a pair of opposite words e.g. Hot -> Cold (or another example you have)
• Match rhyming words e.g. Bug -> Mug
• Match animals to their habitats e.g. Fish -> Sea
• Match the first letter of a word to an image of the word e.g. M -> Monkey
• Match an animal to their food e.g. Monkey -> Banana
• Match an animal to their home e.g. Dog -> Kennel

App Features:
• Listen to the words after a pair has been completed
• Interactive designs and sounds to make playing fun!
• Rewards achievements the more times you play
• Receive a ‘Thumbs Up’ after a lesson has been completed
• Really helpful for learning maths, the number system, the alphabet, words, shapes etc.

The levels on the app start easy and get more challenging each time. For example, after successfully identifying simple pairs like shapes and colours, the app will then move onto matching upper case letters to lower case letters, finding missing numbers and letters, addition and much more. We are sure that kids will love and enjoy playing this app!

summary: Kindergarten can fun and improve kids skills through identify picture.
title: Kindergarten Fun

descriptionHTML:
==What's new?
1. New Function : add 5 difficulties - EASY / NORMAL / HARD / DEVIL / HELL
2. Here a new Kung Fu master is coming. LAURA, the queen of Capoeira comes in.

==Description
Kung Fu Do Fighting, is the action game of fighting. The world's largest fighting contest is started! No ranking, no rules, only dead or alive! Now, a new powerful character appears. The typhoon devil is a NINJA master from Japan and he swears to beat everyone soon. The other contestants include the peerless master of Taekwondo 10 paragraphs, the Mauy Thai Hurricane Death, the Dark Boxing King, the Vicious Beauty Killer and the President X with mysterious assassination skill. Each one for survival and honor must start the toughest fighting. Who is the strongest fighter on the earth?
This action game includes two play modes：
Tournament mode：The player selects own character at first and then enemy appears in random. It is a three point match. The first competitor to score two points therefore wins the match. If there is a draw (both life value is 0), the round will play again.
Survival mode：The player chooses own character at first. The enemy character will be decided randomly. There are no end in a winning game set. The winner's each play will not stop, round and round.

description: Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Features:–ê lot of Christmas items.Beautiful graphics in high expansion.It is supported by all modern devices.Free flight mode.Two game modes: survival and creativity.Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.Dynamically changing world.Many different locations.Many different blocks and objects.For all ages.Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!
It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.
Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.
Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures.
Have a good game! Merry Christmas!

Features:

А lot of Christmas items.
Beautiful graphics in high expansion.
It is supported by all modern devices.
Free flight mode.
Two game modes: survival and creativity.

descriptionHTML:
Be Ben, be an alien, be the hero! Are You Ready?

In this free app, you can transform into one of four Ben 10 Aliens, Diamondhead, Heatblast, Stinkfly or Four Arms, each with their own unique facial interactions and character specific animations. Then take on Zombozo and his robots in 360-degree augmented reality action!

With Ben 10 Alien Experience you get two apps in one, a super cool face swapper and an action-packed robot blaster. Use your device’s camera and see the transformation take place in front of your very eyes as you become one of Ben Tennyson’s amazing alien forms.

Warm things up as Heatblast and experience his fiery powers or chill out as Diamondhead and see icicles appear all around you! Become Stinkfly and shoot out slime balls or smash things up as Four Arms. Take photos and record short videos straight to your device before sharing them with family and friends!

The fun doesn’t end once you transform! Take your device and save the day from waves enemies that only you can see. Use your alien’s powers to defend yourself from Zomboso and his robots in augmented reality gameplay. Use your device as a radar to find and destroy endless hordes of enemies in exciting 360-degree action.

It’s Hero Time!

**********

This game is available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Arabic, Czech, Norwegian, Portuguese, Turkish and Greek.

If you're having any problems, contact us at apps.emea@turner.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using. This app may contain ads for Cartoon Network & our partners’ products & services.

descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.

So, don’t you want to have fun with our Solitaire? Play Solitaire free on Android now
------------------------------------------------------
★How to play★
• Arrange cards in the order of KING to ACE and in Black and Red.
• Be sure that new bundles of cards should start with K.
• Compete your score with your friends!
• Draw card with simple touch.
• Easy to play and easy to set up your own.
• Find necessary card from the piles of cards at the upper-left side.
• Get hints from bulb mark!

★Features★
◆ two modes : Solitaire Classic and Arcade with over 300 challenging levels
◆ Smart Hint , Fast Undo will help you a hand
◆ Beautiful graphics and clean UI
◆ Run well on most Android phones and tablets!
◆ Support multiple screens

comments: I am a guy that likes playing video games and in my opinion the directional controls could be a little more user-friendly I find I have to push too hard or keep repositioning my thumb on the pad to move my character. Also I find it slightly difficult to keep up with the reading portion it goes too fast for me. Other than that the Graphics are awesome and the game all around is pretty fun

The gameplay itself is great don't get me wrong. There's just a few issues that make it not superb to me: the amount of permissions needed and type is kind of ridiculous, and the auto connect is concerning. Outside backend issues, there needs to be a more simple way to change characters besides either closing the game out fully or logging out to do it. Like I said before, great gameplay just some issues to address.

Do not waste your time!  Go in the arena to fight, one on one, Wrong you fight two people at once. If the other players has an almost empty HP and yours is three quarters full, and time ends with one minute left, You lose! PAID TO WIN! Crappy game!

Loved the game till I hit lvl 40. Once you do the game becomes an insane grind fest. Leveling up your gear takes unreal amounts of time. You literally  have to play for hours a day to even progress or spend large quantities of money.

Hello im having trouble of login in to game which is always said that google play service didnt updated or google play account is not logged in but everything is ok till now. Please fix this or give me advice

Not sure if the servers are slow or what but I have never had a game run so sluggish on my tablet. Second complain why does this app need permission or access to make calls through my phone or access to my contacts? That is to much for my liking. Remove those permissions and I wouldn't have a problem with this application/game on my device.

comments: Well, The game is awesome no doubt... Graphics, game play and all... But I am facing a problem here... Yesterday I bought the beginning offer pack and today around after 18 hours or so I can't enter the game anymore.. It says cannot contact the server, please check your Internet connection.. But I have a firm Internet connection, if I didn't have then I wouldn't be writing this review... So please fix this issue...

Just WOW!! I love AMT Games, already played 1st game Epic War TD. That game was awesome. Now, I play this. Still love the gameplay & graphics. But, downside is the League Battle. The higher, the more hard to matchmaking other players. Always find higher level 25> while I'm still level 15. I think it's need better matchmaking. Can't wait for next update..

Used to be great,  but uninstalled now.  Lots of glitches,  especially during last moments of a close fought war. One moment you lead,  the next when the war ends, you do not win.  Also,  removing ads to speed up training time is a major mistake!  You should hire a new VP CS (Vice President for Common Sense) Seriously, connection problems EVERYDAY! Cannot log in to the game.

Definitely one of the best strategy games I've ever played on my Samsung I look forward to playing it more and seeing what more it has to offer. Only gripe I have and it's a tiny one I wish you could zoom in during battles. Other than that very impressed

Things have improved lately. Game support has been helpful. Troops still behave erratically, going sideways to attack storage facilities rather than defensive weapons that are wiping them out. Programmers make change to gameplay criteria without telling anyone why and what has changed.

HIGHER LEAGUE RUINS GAME!!!   Constant attacks thieve all resources... game becomes unplayable. AVOID. And no Explanations   you have to guess what everything does.... Aarrgghh so annoying.  How hard is it to add popups with details.

Marines - take your blasters!
Commanders - start the battle!

BATTLE FOR THE GALAXY

Battle for the Galaxy is an exciting mixture of tower defense, strategy and dynamic battles. Create a powerful army and join corporation. Attack enemies to earn glory and valuable resources.

Download Battle for the Galaxy now!

● Free online strategy game

In order for the game to function properly we need permission to read and write to your SD card. This is required to be able to download and store additional game content like units, maps, buildings and so on.

comments: Okay so I am editing my review.  They have the makings of what could be a great game. The only map I have access to so far is a beautiful battle map. Good amout of obstacles some nice cover and it look great.  My issues are with character movement. When you hit [dash] turning is almost none existing.  Your going in a straight line. One of the main reasons for dashing (for the hunter at least) is getting behind new cover. It would be nice if I could dash and weave my way through the obstacles.   Response time from scope up/scope down (hunter) needs work too as is it's way to slow. "Nice I shot the lead guy. But cr... theres two more coming and scope still up. DOWN, DOWN!  M O V E!!!"

i am totally addicted to the game, I know that this game is still in the middle of improvement, the only thing I noticed is the battle area, I hope that the area would be more wider than what we have right now. Also the solo game, please put an option to play the game randomly teamed up instead of customizing the battle wherein we still need to invite other people. All in all, the game experiece was amazing. üíìüíû
Great game. But sometimes the enemy can't see me and just pass by me. I'm not sure if its my connection to your server or its a bug. I hope it can be fixed.
It feels like i m playing with bots..... And no real time chat with squad mates during fights.... That will make this game interesting...

Hi Funter! Great game you have here! But I know this can get better.  I've really enjoyed the first few days of playing this game. I'm also pretty content with the reward system, it's great to see you are generous with providing players considerable amount of money evertime we accomplish an objective. But I hope there's also a bonus when ranking up. I'm ranking up fast but I noticed I don't receive any kind of reward. But no worries, the objectives rewards got it covered.  Arena fights really got me hooked. The matchmaking was quick with less than a minute to prepare for a match. Fights were intense as more got eliminated. But I do have to complain about some parts. I hope you can allow players to do a slight curve while running or make that a skill to upgrade... It kind of limits the strategy to escape to safety when all you're heading to is a wall. same goes when I'm trying to turn my character 360¬∞ to face opponents behind me. I hope you can make turning a lot smoother next time. Aiming is hmmkay but it's not bad altogether. I'm glad it's made into a skill that can be upgraded but it felt much slippery when I upgraded it much. (I use the archer guy most of the time so...)  Lag was also present. I noticed one when one of my opponents suddenly turned towards me when he was facing his side some seconds ago.   Anyway, I'm really looking forward to this game. Game's got really good potential and I'm loving every minute I play this game.
It's fun but the only issue I have is that the explosive rc car has no tracking on it. How can I drive it if I don't know where the other people are?

comments: The game is a lot of fun, very addictive. The only problem I'm having is it seems to close by itself. I'm running it on the Razer Phone so I know I can more than handle this game. No lag, no freezes.. Just random force closure. You should check that out devs. Otherwise, good all round.

I love this game. Every part of it. Even the weird "multiplayer" that's supported by another app... the graphics are incredible, music is intense yet becomes subtle in the background after a bit of playing. It's challenging enough to come back and try again after dying without giving up completely. I have experienced zero bugs or glitches during regular gameplay. You've made the perfect game for me, and I thank you.

In general a pretty good game, but the achievements rarely register. I have a high score of 11, and yet I don‚Äôt have the loop 10 achievement. I needed to get past loop 5 about 6 times before it finally gave me the achievement. Other than that though, I liked it.

This game has little to offer. U just jump over obstacles and thats it. Customizable options are so bad and expensive. Your in the first person prespective so why bother customizing yourself. Theres barely a difference from your default skin to the most expensive skin. But the game is OK i guess. Nothing special

Really cool game. Expect to rage as you move higher up in the loops.  Really wish there was a way to save replays. I love that the devs give you the option to turn ads on and reward you for having them on instead of making you pay to turn them off like other game devs. Keep it up!

Two things I've noticed: 1. Haptic is a little laggy; maybe make a section in setting to let users adjust that to their own devices? 2. Graphics are amazing but it seems like the FR is spotty which effects users' game play; maybe add a setting if you haven't already for lower quality options?

descriptionHTML:
Want to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals? Get ready to show everyone who’s boss by fighting in open world real action game. Rule the streets in this action-packed game.

Intro: In this game you are a real city gangster - hero, who is not afraid of anything. Savage, aggressive criminals are everywhere. They shoot, kill people, rob banks and stores. There is a criminal chaos in the city.
It's time to show everyone who’s boss by shooting rivals and ruling the streets. You are not a policeman. You are a gangster, who don't need glory - you have a greed for revenge. You have a big gun and must kill as much as possible bandits with guns, knifes and other weapons.

San Andreas Crime City is action packed with 20 exciting missions. When you are driving around in San Andreas you can look on the minimap for missions or you can use the quick buttons to start right away a mission. Download the game for free.

AN ARSENAL OF WEAPONS
Choose from a gun store: Machine Guns, RPGs, Sniper Rifles and Shotguns.

WHAT's NEW
-> Boat physics
-> Helicopter and Aircraft physics
-> Get in the car and get out animations
-> Most realistic city traffic and crowd simulation

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.

descriptionHTML:
How exciting! Kiki is going shopping with Mama Panda! It means the freedom to explore, only if he can stay out of trouble! See the problems he will run into! Perhaps, you can give him a big hand!

comments: Now these days, to be powerful is cards. And it's really sad to see it in one of my favorite fighting game. I have a galaxy s8 plus and when I put the controls on large, it feels like there on medium. If your playing duel and your opponent has 5 power points ahead of you, just call it a lost. Do better. Battlefront 2 is about to be banned in Germany because of the card system. I hope you look into it.  Edited: it's still the same. It feels like a pay to win. I'm going back to shadow fight 2. You know. The good one.

I really like playing the game. It has great animations smooth gameplay and isn't too easy or hard. The one thing I dont like is you can't sell your old equipment or skills. If there was a shop to sell them or add runes to them or be able to combine them to make either new or more powerful ones of the sane type I would give this game 5 stars.hopefully the Devs will take this and add this feature in a update. Speaking of updates, I just installed the latest one it was like 403MB but nothing changed! What was the update for then?

Hey NEKKI i have the best suggestion ever. WHY DON'T YOU add a grab button separately or at least give the option. Also make the side quest more satisfying. Just giving me commons just isn't going to work. Please nerf the herlad faction. 1 its crit chance is to stupidly high 17 percent is to much. Its also so quick and has long range

The game is a lot of fun but there's one big problem the only way to advance in the story mode is by leveling up and getting better armor but the only way to level up is in story mode so your other option is spend real money on better equipment. So it's kinda just a money grab. If that was fixed I'd give it 10 stars

Classical pay per win game. Once you advance (e.g. lv 4-5), winning against the computer in the main quest is only possible after several days of waiting for free cards and random levelling of the weapons via chests (gained via duels). Glitches in skills usage are also observed.

Please consider this. Chest timings have to be lessened if you want prolonged engagement to the game. AI has to be checked because they act like gods not the opponents you like to compete with. Please add a feature of disposing of extra equipment in a way of either selling for coins and gems or letting them combining to have a better tool.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

description: Let's go shopping at the mall with princess cash register! You can play as both the shopper and cashier. Use your pretty pink cash register to ring up any of the 52 princess items available. You can shop for makeup, shoes, bags, tiaras, and dresses. The cash register is a real working calculator with a scanner that can scan the available merchandise. You can also swipe the credit card to pay at the end of the shopping spree. Move money in and out of the cash register. Give your customer the right amount of change. There are also 6 different shopping phrases sound. Have fun and use your imagination with this princess cash register. You can now go to checkout with up to 3 items. Get the full version to checkout unlimited items, use credit card to pay, and ad free experience. This is the prettiest cash register for all the princesses out there. Show your best fashion sense.

descriptionHTML:
Frontline BattleField Mission is the new first-person shooter, where you can show your excellent shooting skills.

The terrorists attacked and occupied the city, and the people were forced to leave their homes. The terrorists in the city are planning the next terrorist activity. You are an elite commando striker, you accept a difficult mission. To destroy all the terrorists and restore the peace of the city.

- Challenging missions
- realistic shooting sound effects
- High quality music
- a variety of powerful weapons
- Smart AI, make the game more interesting
- play anytime, anywhere

The high-powered action adds to the excitement of the game. In the game, the world seems to transform into a battlefield and you become the warrior.

In the introduction of the game, the entire town spot an alien in the sky. The enforcement officers have issued a warning to everyone for staying inside the door. comments: The storyline is amazing, theres so much detail into the characters, the artstyle, it's beautiful. As a game, I find it highly addictive too!!! Shame I started from the second one!! Ah well, it can be a "blast from the past" type of story ;)

What I would love to know is why, when I have already purchased the game, and had to do a factory reset on my tablet, I now have a game FULL OF ADS.  The game is also asking me to buy full game.  Are ALL my Emily games going to do this as I reinstall them?  NOT very happy right now!!!

I love it!  When I first play heart medical,  I thought it was a boring game.  But, then I play level one then that when I thought it would have more levels until they got to the end. And then I was Emily helping them out.

One of the best time management games I have played.The story is really good,if you are into these kind of games and love shows as "Grey's Anatomy". A huge thank you to all in the Game House,for making this game and making it also possible to play without paying.And I will certainly be buying the other two games,a prequel to this game and also its sequel :)

Can't get past the pharmacy level, even though I have bought the game. It keeps repeating the opening cut scene. I don't have a lot of room on my tablet, so I probably will have to delete. Very unhappy‚òπ

We have to watch ads just to be able to play? Sorry, but that isn't fair. I love this game but don't have an internet connection. I love this game, but am mad that I can't play it due to this stupid reason. And $9.99 just for a mobile game?! No way!

descriptionHTML:
Fall in love with a new game from the creators of Delicious and Fabulous! GameHouse introduces Heart’s Medicine Time to Heal – a time management game that combines the action of hospital games with a captivating love story!

It’s a romantic medical drama like you haven’t seen before in Grey’s Anatomy, ER or General Hospital! Role play as the aspiring surgeon Allison Heart in one of the best simulation games yet, and battle feelings between a blooming love with Daniel, Head of the Hospital, and Connor, an old flame. Just like a real love story, our drama is not without its twists and turns! When Daniel suddenly has a terrible accident, Allison rushes to save his life! This is where Heart’s game begins.

Become a doctor in this hospital simulation game!
Take care of patients and perform virtual surgery in this surgery simulator game. Heart’s Medicine is a thrilling online RPG game that brings the doctor’s office to life! Whether you’re in search of kids doctor games for girls or life simulation games, you’ll enjoy this one!

Develop your time management skills and save lives!
If you’re a fan of online time management games then you’ll LOVE Time to Heal! This time game has it all – challenging levels, stimulating storyline, exciting role playing and much more!

Be part of a whirlwind romance!
Can’t get enough of romantic love stories? Time to Heal is one of the most moving love games online.

Enjoy the 2nd Season of Heart’s Medicine
★ Help Allison heal patients and enjoy light-hearted moments with lots of fun game characters
★ Play this surgeon simulator free for 5 levels and unlock 60 story levels, plus 30 challenge levels, with an in-game purchase
★ 18 never-before-seen mini-games – these cool games will entertain you for months!
★ Guest-starring Delicious’ Emily – run the hospital diner and get a taste of the award-winning cooking games
★ Collect trophies & diamonds to get decorations for the new hospital wing and more features!

Ready for a true love game that takes playing doctor to a whole other level? It’s game time!

Follow Us: www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame

★ Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears
★ Delicious - Emily's Home Sweet Home
★ Delicious - Emily's New Beginning

★ Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever
★ Fabulous - Angela's Sweet Revenge

title: Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal

comments: WOW. This game has everything! My only complaint is that the "earning" free in game currency section (downloading and playing other games to certain level), does not yield in game currency, so do not bother. Just pay for stuff when it goes on sale. But otherwise, WOW! This is like fanfic, sims, empire, battle, idle, all in one! Hpw often do you get an all in one game based off an amazing franchise?? (As of this date, ive been playing for 2 months, spent $10)

I know the update on The Book of Dragons came out a long time ago, but I still can't make sense of it. The old book of Dragons was a lot easier to understand. If you filtered it to show only searchable dragons, then it would show in order what you unlock. I'm not sure, but from what I understand is that the dragons are now arranged in time to search. That's neat and all, but could you please come out with a filter for dragon unlocsks by Lvl?  Dragons unlocked at a later Lvl is usually better. With the current filter, you can find a dragon which collect 14 mill wood/hour with dragons collecting 1.05 mill wood because it is arranged by time to search. Again, please release a filter option by Lvl unlocked? Thanks for your help!

I really prefer  the old version of  this game like how you'd have a dragon and you'd guard a wagon and collect gold and fish and some time a new egg. And if a dragon attacked you'd battle it and have to tilt your tablet to fly aim you fire blasts.could you add a dragon racing minigame

I love it even if it's not real I don't care though and I think it could use an update about more dragons and more offers about coins and ruins but free ones cause no likes spending money on games unless they last forever so keep up that good work.  And one more update that the dragon and grand dragons like foreverwing and more but make them cheaper with ruins and what ever more .  And I love the game u should get it.

Game is a good time killer, but getting anywhere in the Jerk at Work is almost impossible. 3 waves of enemies above my level and the only way I can even the odds is if I pay for sage fruit. That is far too stupid and dumb. Thanks for being impossible to beat. UGH

The new update is really great!  But there's one glitch when unlocking the legendary dragons. The part in collecting resources for 15 days. It stopped counting the hours since I updated. (It was already 9 days and counting...)   Please fix this.

descriptionHTML:
***Reached No.1 App in Over 85 Countries!***

Build your OWN Berk! Rescue, hatch and train your favorite DreamWorks Dragons! Explore uncharted lands in a vast Viking world!

Join Hiccup, Toothless and the gang to protect your village from the mysterious strangers that threaten peace on Berk. Who are they? And, what do they want from your harmonious homeland? Train your DreamWorks Dragons successfully and they’ll reveal new powers that will help to ensure the future of your island.

Remember…it takes a village...and DRAGONS!

Features:
• Discover all your favorite DreamWorks Dragons from the movie, including Toothless, Stormfly, Hookfang and Skullcrusher
• Collect and grow over 350 different Dragon species, like Deadly Nadders, Monstrous Nightmares and Typhoomerangs
• Complete missions with all the characters from DreamWorks Dragons
• Stunning visual & audio effects with 3D animations

This is YOUR Berk. It's time to RISE!

* Please note: Rise of Berk is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

© 2014 Ludia Inc. 'How to Train Your Dragon 2' © 2014 DreamWorks Animation L.L.C. All Rights Reserved.

comments: Of all the versions, this is the best. I have played and deleted several apps of the same kind for several reasons, poor graphics or game play etc but like this one a lot. Sit back and relax and let time pass..

Please add a fast forward button earlier as I love this game but waiting nearly 2 minutes for all the balls to be fired is becoming boring and makes me want to stop playing. I used to spend an hour playing each time now after 10 minutes I can't take the waiting. Otherwise this is a great time to occupy my time
Hard Infinite  Non-Battery eater like minecraft(no offence notch, Jeb,and Mojang, I love Minecraft)(to dev response:) I don't know how to do that.
Plz add fast forward button it takes about more than minute to throw 1000 ball.... Makes it little boring..

It's okay. Found myself playing it a lot but the skanky ads are hard to deal with. Embarrassing when they come up when I'm in public or with my family! I decided to try the "Replay" option that is a selection after pressing pause. I had 1832 levels completed and it took me down to 1800!!!! I'm now struggling with if I'm mad enough to uninstall!!! I am looking for an alternative and will uninstall when I find it. Taking away levels without warning and the ads sunk it for me.
Highly addictive game...!!! Adds have high traffic and thus sometimes very annoying...!!!

comments: It's a great game, you can have fun while also learning a lot of interesting facts about the world. You actually can play without paying, you can watch ads to get tickets for example, I have 200 tickets even tho I haven't paid a cent. The only thing that I don't get is the new content community, it would've been great if we'd gotten some clarification on that, but oh well.

Seems like a okay game. But every time I downloaded and installed it I had nothing but problems with my phone, Samsung Galaxy s5. I know the developers will say their game is not capable of causing problems with phone, but I tested it several times and it always came back to this game being the problem. But for the time I was able to use the game, it did seem like an okay game.

USA! USA! far to many questions that are about the USA for the jobs. Please improve your question bank. I'll even help out if you want. Part from that the game is OK passes the time and learn a few new things along the way. I now know alot of US ambassadors.
I'm So Sad! Once you get into the game and Really Like it! They trap you... You have to purchase "money" to travel to different cities. Not good. I'm uninstalling. ‚òπÔ∏è

I love the game lots of fun! The only thing is it keeps freezing up on me on some of the questions. I then have to restart it and I get penalized as if I didn't know that block of questions. Other than that it is a really fun game and I am enjoying it.

Very heavily US questions based which isn't good for the millions of people that don't live in the states. It's especially insulting when you're in Sydney Australia and most of the questions for the careers relate to the US. Also, seriously lame that you now have to spend large amounts of bp tickets just to complete land marks. I'm going to uninstall.
description: Your bag is packed and you‚Äôre ready to go, but as fate has it, you‚Äôre stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.Backpacker Features* Test your trivia skills!        * See the world, one city at a time!* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city! * Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!        * Help strangers around the world for secret rewards! * Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all? * Which mini game will become your new favourite?"Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle, Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to www.facebook.com/BackpackerGame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!
descriptionHTML:
Your bag is packed and you’re ready to go, but as fate has it, you’re stranded in Rome with only 500 coins in your pocket. What now?

Show the world what you’re made of in Backpacker, a new globetrotting trivia game!
Save up enough money to continue your travels by going on various missions and applying for odd jobs!
At the end of each day, either splurge on a hotel or risk sleeping in the streets.
Discover new cities and maybe even learn a thing or two along the way.

Backpacker Features

* Test your trivia skills!
* See the world, one city at a time!
* Complete your memento collection with tokens from each city!
* Collect job diplomas and earn cash for traveling!
* Help strangers around the world for secret rewards!
* Stamp your passport in each city, can you collect them all?
* Which mini game will become your new favourite?"

Conquer the world, become a Backpacker!

Backpacker has been lovingly created, we take fun seriously.
Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle, Wordalot or WordBrain 2!

We really value your feedback, go to www.facebook.com/BackpackerGame and say what's on your mind!
More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.com

Good Times!
recentChanges: Welcome to a new update Backpackers! In this version we have several new and exciting things:
- Welcome to the Content Community where you can create your own job questions, and quality check others. You can access it in the menu down to the right!
- We have moved the Milestones button into your passport! So now everything you have to claim in the game is located inside the passport.
As always, we wish you happy travels Backpackers!
summary: Show the world what you‚Äôre made of in Backpacker the globetrotting trivia game!
title: Backpacker‚Ñ¢ - Travel Trivia Game

description: For the sake of making the war technology, the scientists mistakenly install the malware program in the robotic machines. Fight with the war robotic machines will give you angst and breathtaking feeling while playing this robotic war game. Just grab the free Multi Iron Eagle Robot vs Robotic Machines action simulation and enjoy it.

comments: What's The Problem At The App There Is No Sound At All Fix The Game!! It's One Of My Beloved Apps in all Ios Apk. I Was Playing Since 2012 On Old Ios IPad 3 oldest version Fluik Companies Fix The App Sound Problem At The Game.

Been playing this game for quite some time now. I believe I first installed it in 2014. It's addictive and super fun. Similar to Paper Toss. My boyfriend's kids and my son enjoyed the game, as well. Good graphics, easy to navigate/play, a time-killer for when you're bored or on the go. Downloaded the Holiday Edition, also and played it one Christmas. Very fun game, overall. I really miss the mPoints feature. I wish you could have given us a heads up before doing away with it. One last thing I would like to add, please keep adding new items to throw at the Jerk. All in all, keep up the good work!
ITS SOOOOO√íOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO BORING. ALL YPU DO ITA THROW STUFF. WOW THIS GAME IS SO COLL I TOTALLY DON'T HATE IT.

This game definitely doesnt deserve its high positive rating.  I think the game can be very fun, but the way you get coins are absolutely asinine and the challenge thing is broken, this also goes for Office zombie and OJ holiday.   For a simple game where you get reactions out of a man, these peoplebehind the game are trying WAAAY too hard to get money out of people. I wish doing some achivements would also unlock some items since they have a crapload of achivements.  EDIT: UPDATE THE DAMN GAME FOR ANDROID
It's fun but it's way too hard to get coins for the items. As for throwing stuff at him, it does nothing besides going for a high score.
He's really mean but this game is so fun. When I said he's really mean I'm talking about the The Office Jerk

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

I don't think levels are nessecary. Basically, they don't exactly apply to anything so put them in 'task list' based on days you need to do. Also,controls and graphics are pretty good but try to polish them a bit. It needs some work. Please make this more interesting.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You‚Äôre the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids‚Äô breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom‚Äôs daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! descriptionHTML:
This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun!
Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more!

Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. The nature and weather conditions vary to make this a more diverse and interesting game that brings the Jurassic age to the 21st century.      Check your upgrades. Your dino‚Äôs age and experience level will show. Upgrade its speed, attack ability, defense, and energy.    As you roam, you‚Äôll see images of your objectives, then will be set free. You‚Äôll be on the hunt. Keep your T-Rex going and fight with other dinos when they get in the way!   The T-Rex may have died out millions of years ago, but lives on in this game. Don‚Äôt just experience one ‚Äì be one! With your help, it can rule the Earth once again.Key features:- Awesome 3D graphics- Different locations (sand, snow, ice) and weather conditions- Lot of upgrades for the main character ‚Äì T-Rex- 9 different dinos to fight with (Allosaurus, Compsognathus, Diplodocus, Parasaurolophus, Quetzalcoatlus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Velociraptors)
descriptionHTML:
Jurassic Adventures transports you back to the age of the dinosaurs.

First, choose the mode you want to play in. The free “Survive” mode lets your T-Rex roam in an open, endless world. In “Adventures” mode, be a dinosaur in five different locations. The nature and weather conditions vary to make this a more diverse and interesting game that brings the Jurassic age to the 21st century.

Check your upgrades. Your dino’s age and experience level will show. Upgrade its speed, attack ability, defense, and energy.

As you roam, you’ll see images of your objectives, then will be set free. You’ll be on the hunt. Keep your T-Rex going and fight with other dinos when they get in the way!

The T-Rex may have died out millions of years ago, but lives on in this game. Don’t just experience one – be one! With your help, it can rule the Earth once again.

Key features:
- Awesome 3D graphics
- Different locations (sand, snow, ice) and weather conditions
- Lot of upgrades for the main character – T-Rex
- 9 different dinos to fight with (Allosaurus, Compsognathus, Diplodocus, Parasaurolophus, Quetzalcoatlus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Velociraptors)
summary: Jurassic Adventures transports you back to the age of the dinosaurs !
title: Jurassic Adventures 3D

comments: Amazing and a unique type of game. The currency is all obtainable even as a free to play. Cool looking dragons and the movement in the game more lively than just pictures. I've played many app before this and I would say that this is top 1 so far. The only problem is the game will stop and crash. I don't know the reason but I've tried in another device and also stops working. Overall the game is magnificent and I definitely recommend it to everyone!

Awesome! I really like the game. Top 5 game? Worth it! I've played some similar game but this one is the best. The graphic is great and the dragons are cute. The resources are not too hard to get. The best part is the drag-skill! It's really different. Each dragon have their skill effect with different area form. You have to drag it right. A long way to be a master tamer. So enjoy the process!

I Tried this game with fair expectations, and even as I started i thought it might not be as fun as some other ones I've tried. But this game legitimately blew my standards away! It looks great, latency is great, gameplay is great! It's just a great game. Characters have simple tropes but are written in a likable way, which can't be said for alot of games. Everything about this game is very approachable and fun, and not to mention really nice to look at. I'm a fan for sure!

This game is awesome. The graphics are beautiful. The game is really unique because of the dragging skills. This game definitely give you a lot of chance for getting a good dragon. In my opinion it is action packed. Overall the game is awesome. The only reason I rate 4 stars is because of the fact that the game crashes several times and sometimes freezes. However, this game is still the best game out of all the other dragon game I played.

Good games guys but the summon rate for a 5 star is too low. Im one of the top players on the server. When i do get a 5 star its one that i already have. Also the log in event is not working for the American server. Even if you pay. Its a waste cuz rates are too low. So don't

Pretty well made game afterall, all currency ingame can be obtained in fairly free and quick way. The game also offers really big help/supply for newbies. Spend a few (for me 3)days and you can already get 3 times of 11 advanced draw. Can get a little bit of grindy but not pay to win either. The flaws being some English translation error and extreme flashy visual effects, and the lack of (limited even) variety of the dragons and campaign plot.

descriptionHTML:
World War III: European Wars

General. lead your army to the Conquest of Europe in World War 3

Epic world war 3 real time strategy game for free! Conquer all Europe!

Get ready to fight the deadliest world war 3 battles of the 21st century in bases full of monstrous enemy military base. The rivalry forces have attacked yor base and your base with the military tanks, soldiers, Humvees and Rocket Tanks has turned it into battlefield. The enemies are in the ferocious tanks that are loaded with explosive weapons. You being the general need to destroy the deadly beasts in the best way possible and capture enemy base by totally destroying their military bases.

Your European enemies have done an alliance against you and your president decided to invade Europe and USA. However it is very hard to conquer all Europe and USA so very fierce battles waiting for you, General!

You will be invading Sweden, Belgium, Holland, Italy, Germany France, England, Turkey, Russia and eventually USA. So, General lead your army very carefully and deploy them wherever you an destroy enemy ground forces.

how to play:

It is very easy to play the game, click on move / soldier icon to deploy your units and click on pointer to move camera left, right, forward or back. do not forget that if you do not choose move / soldier icon you will not be able to deploy your army.


FEATURES

Free form quest map that allows players to decide when and where to fight within a historical framework.

More than 6 different units all accurately researched and carefully modeled in amazing detail.

Almost infinite number of equipment combinations.

descriptionHTML:
Time for you and your friends to become the best little chefs around! No adults are around and you kids are hungry – you better prepare food, and fast! You guys are in charge – cook and bake whatever yummy food you want, and have a food fight!

Uh-oh – You’re starving, and no parents are home to feed you! It’s up to you and your friends to turn into gourmet chefs and make a delicious meal! Who said dinner before dessert?! You’re in charge now! Get creative in the kitchen and eat all the mouthwatering food you want!

Features:
> Is that your stomach growling? No one’s home to give you dinner, so you better get to the kitchen and start cooking!
> Turn into little kitchen wizards with your friends and prepare your favorite meals!
> Go to the supermarket with your friends and fill your carts to your heart’s desire!
> Choose yummy recipes to make, from 4 amazing cookbooks!
> Dress up as mini chefs, and clean up the messy kitchen! Don’t forget your chef’s hat!
> Use professional chef tools to make homemade pasta and pizza from scratch!
> FOOD FIGHT! Get messy in the kitchen.
> Bake cupcakes and make your own ice cream!
> You guys worked so hard making all that food – now it’s time to enjoy it in the dining room!
> Oh no! The oven exploded and one of your friends got hurt. Treat him with professional doctor tools so he can bake those treats!
> Have bake contests and vote for your favorite food. Who will win 1st prize?

description: My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is ‚Äî‚Äî a werewolf!And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.Features:- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it‚Äôs a secret old house behind our high school!- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!- Bella finds a diary here! There‚Äôs a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says ‚ÄúZ&V, 1918‚Äù. What was happening here one hundred years ago?- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?- The third room is a bathroom. Bella‚Äôs hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit! - Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!Wanna have more fun? We would love to hear from you!Find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/Beauty-Salon-Games-1094161030602834/For more information about Beauty Salon Games, please visit http://www.beautysalongames.net/
descriptionHTML:
My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!

Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is —— a werewolf!

And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!

A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.


Features:
- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it’s a secret old house behind our high school!
- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!
- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!
- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!
- Bella finds a diary here! There’s a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says “Z&V, 1918”. What was happening here one hundred years ago?
- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?
- The third room is a bathroom. Bella’s hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit!
- Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!
- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!
