description: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you‚Äôll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock!  ....Good luck!  ‚Ä¢ 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you‚Äôve ever seen.‚Ä¢ Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.‚Ä¢ Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.‚Ä¢  Hints and Answers available as IAPEscape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
descriptionHTML:
No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...

Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?

Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.

With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock! ....Good luck!

• 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.
• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.
• Hints and Answers available as IAP

Escape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
summary: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...
title: Escape Alcatraz

descriptionHTML:
Tom, a Genius School graduate, is looking for his dream job. What’ll it be? Astronaut? Firefighter? Pilot? Guess again… he’s decided to become a superstar hairdresser! Only problem is, his bosses don’t let him touch actual hair… unless it’s on the floor. Poor Tom is only allowed to stick to menial tasks like scrubbing floors and answering phones. Play this mischievous hairdressing game to help Tom cut his way from “barberchop” around the corner to world-class designer hair salons… all while avoiding his bosses’ watchful eye.

Cheating Tom graduated Genius School. Now he’s got to enter the real world and get a job. So his days of sneaking around are probably over, right? WRONG. As they say, “once a cheater, always a cheater.” Play this game to help Tom become an amazing hairstylist without getting caught by his annoying bosses who are determined to keep him sweeping the floors day after day.

Features:
> Help Tom sneak his way from hair salon to hair salon!
> Hurry up and get playing! You’ve got 25 different hairstyles to master as you play this crazy game!
> Make sure he cuts and styles customers’ hair as quickly as possible before his boss notices.
> Tons of challenging levels & supercool game play modes for ultra sneakiness.
> Score power-ups and collect coins to become sneakier than ever.
> WARNING: You may encounter some extremely peculiar customers…!
> Chop-chop! Cut that hair as fast as you can, and make sure the customers are satisfied, OR ELSE!
> Choose your game avatar - Tom or Taffy – and get cutting!
> Dress Tom and Taffy up in crazy costumes.

comments: Super fun needs minor improvements Actually very fun but could use a speedometer calibration, the cars go from 215 mph and shoot way down to 170 in the corners of the first track, the speed seems too fast for what the cars are actually doing.. It seems a little stretched but that's all. and sound improvements for the cars ... Other than that it's legit

Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.

😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks.

😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?
How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time.

• 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL
• Experience new controls
• Unlock wacky achievements
• Conquer the global leaderboard
• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed

😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.

We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!

#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames

description: Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.Good luck!- The child was born recently;- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;- First you have to wash him;- Fill the tub with warm water;- Use special detergents;- Use a clean towel to remove water;- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;- You have to disinfect wounds;- You have to remove the bee pins;- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;- Offer only healthy food;- Offer his favorite toy;- Decorate the child's bedroom;- You did a great job, the child is happy.Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Hi, there are many families who daily expecting a new member. A child is a blessing for every parent and every time a baby is coming into this world is waiting with great emotion. The happiness that one parent feels when he can keep his baby in his arms is wonderful, this sensation is unique and makes us enjoy life. We all like to look like a baby smiles for the first time and we all expect the first word of the baby. Perhaps you're a sensitive child and understand what feels a parent for his child and through this game for girls you'll be able to meet a family that is going to have a baby.
To be able to do everything we planned you will have to play the role of a doctor, after the baby is born you will have to take care of him because his mother is very busy.
Please follow all instructions of the game to care for babies.
Good luck!

- The child was born recently;
- This is a playful, healthy baby and you will surely love to meet him;
- First you have to wash him;
- Fill the tub with warm water;
- Use special detergents;
- Use a clean towel to remove water;
- Choose the most beautiful clothes and accessories;
- While the child is in his room a few bees came and stung him, he needs medical care;
- You have to disinfect wounds;
- You have to remove the bee pins;
- Apply an ointment for the treating of wounds;
- Finally you will need to apply patches on wounds;
- Before starting the treatment you will have to catch bees;
- Now the child feels well and he wants to eat;
- Offer only healthy food;
- Offer his favorite toy;
- Decorate the child's bedroom;
- You did a great job, the child is happy.

Thank you for what you did today, you are a brave kid and please come back daily to help us through this game for kids.

Have fun!
summary: Newborn baby care - baby games
title: Newborn Baby Caring

comments: Cool & Rad It is playable. It's that kind of game that you can play to escape an awkward and gloomy environment. It will keep you entertained and busy while you have no choice but to be with a crowd that loves to boast and flaunt their skin. It an adventure. Maybe you can add a story? But over all its cool. Thank you.

Great side scrolling fighting game. The enemies are intelligent and the boss fights from level two onwards are quite the challenge. However, the artwork of the game will remain highlight. Controls could be slightly better but otherwise this game is worth the download and time spent.   Good job!

It is a great, fun and exciting game.  However, the game is not allowing me to play levels 4, 5, & 6.  After you defeat the werewolf boss the game  does not let you continue to the next level.  The controls to access the ultimate move should be at the bottom of the screen somewhere.

This ninja game is quite good to play as a 2d ninja game.  I would like to 2 things to be improved.    1.  The controls seem to be working alright when you move the ninja guy left or right by yourself but when you're attacking the monsters from either side when pressing the attack buttons as well the special attack buttons on the left hand side, while pressing the left and right buttons, the left and right buttons go out of sync while fighting the monsters at the same time, thus is why the ninja guy is dying faster.  2.  When buying armour in the inventory screen, you had to view video ads to unlock the more expensive armour.  I understand that you keep your app going with ads but i'm sure there are other ways to do this.  One suggestion you could improve on this is play the ninja guy and keep leveling him up and keep building up the money until you can upgrade the ninja  guy with armour or what you could do is do the cheating thing and find a hack for this game with having unlimited money on it.  This is for the programmer to improve this game on.  Thanks  Matt
A great game to kill some free time.. The downside is you have to pay to unlock greater weapons and armors otherwise you have to play and play until you reach the last stage
The enemy  comes  from  back  and  also  forward.  It  becomes  hard  to fight  with  enemies  on both  sides. Just  that  has  to be  improved.  Otherwise  it  is a  good  game.

description: In this map for Minecraft you will see beautiful and mysterious city named Los Dangeles. In this city were realized all incredible ideas, which you may see in different architecture of numerous cities. Here you will find a lot of beautiful high buildings and even districts of skyscrapers. A lot of houses of small amount of floors. The police station and several hospitals. Across the river, which flows in the city, there are several unique designed bridges. Twin-towers, located in this city, look really beautiful, on the background of the moon and going down sun. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

description: You‚Äôve seen them on the streets, on your commute and in your office; fidget spinners. Now these stress relieving toys come to your hand on Android. descriptionHTML:
You’ve seen them on the streets, on your commute and in your office; fidget spinners. Now these stress relieving toys come to your hand on Android. With this simulator game, you no longer need a real fidget spinner!

A fidget spinner is a toy that sits like a propeller on a person’s finger, with blades that spin around a bearing. Basically a fidget spinner consists of a two or three pronged design with a bearing in its center circular pad. Flick them for fun or for dumping your excess energy now!

Game Features:
- Realistic simulator with authentic spinning physics
- Dozens of fidget spinners to choose from
- Glow, laser and neon graphics shown even more details of the spinners

descriptionHTML:
This application will help you to install one of the most popular mods for Minecraft Pocket Edition - Furniture.
Whitch includes:

-DL Box (Purple Shulker) – Unboxes the furniture which you want to get
-Computer (Black Shulker) – Decoration only
-Statue (White Shulker) – Use a name tag to name it
-Radio (Red Shulker) – Give it a gold ingot to play a song
-Table (Orange Shulker) – Storage container, drop items on table, then long press on it to access the items
-Chair (Yellow Shulker) – Sittable
-Fridge (Green Shulker) – Store food items
-Coffee Table (Lime Shulker) – Storage container, drops items on table, then long press on it to access the items
-Stool (Blue Shulker) – Sittable
-Blender (Cyan Shulker) – Blend apples, melons, potatoes and carrots into potions
-BBQ Grill (Light Blue Shulker) – Cook your raw meat and fish
-Safe / Vault (Magenta Shulker) – Hide your important items
-Bin (Pink Shulker) – Drop your items in the bin. You can collect them by long pressing on it.
-Bathtub (Gray Shulker) – You can sit in the bathtub. But first you need to fill it up with some water. Use some soap (Light Gray Dye) to add some water and then have a seat. -You can empty the bathtub by long pressing on it with an empty bucket.
-Toilet (Brown Shulker) – Sittable

One click easy to install.

Attention: this application is created for connoisseurs of quality pastime. We are not manufacturers (Mojang AB) or a subsidiary of Minecraft Pocket Edition. The name Minecraft, the brand and assets of Minecraft are the property of Minecraft Mojang AB or its owner. All rights reserved.
http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

title: Mod Furniture for MCPE

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for a dangerous amusing, wild and overwhelming trip to Sin City!
Enjoy what Vegas offers by shooting rival gangs and stealing cars to run around the strip, pushing your fortune into the casino and personalizing your topics. You can even fly into the sky as long as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

ABOUT NEEDS

* Kill the zombies, try to fly with robots and even fight with the shadow clans of HELL, while your story takes you to incredible places.

WELCOME TO EXTERNAL GANG CITY AUTO
* Play the battle with martial arts (MMA), whose dreams of the Grand Champion Battle Royale face the world of thefts, gangs, zombies, etc. In the BLOCKBUSTER STORY mode.
* Fight through 80 missions, full of action, auto racing, shooting and much more. Use your skills and your brain to cope with any task that you throw at you.
* Create clans of criminals to knock out from the shadows against your numerous enemies.

FREE PLANE
* Explore BIG CITY, 9 times more than the previous gangster game, for a ridiculously complex mobile world where you always need to do something and commit theft.
* Perform tricks with Ragdoll effects that are so successful that they are successful because they are terribly failing because of the amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
* Watch your name in the rating, as you overcome such problems as air, water and street patrols, MMA battles, FPS openings and much more!
* Become the best sniper from Vegas, shooting him in Carnage & Heist mode.
* Break the pot, killing them in exciting CASINO games. Theft is not the only way to make big money!

SEE ON THE WILD SIDE
* Access to crazy weapons, like Molotov cocktails, long sniper rifles, flames and electric guitar! Choose the right one to face the threat.
* Stay mobile while driving CRAZY VEHICLES, including monsters of trucks, muscle cars, tanks and combat aircraft. So look - there is no autopilot for these dogs of war!
* Improve your skills for smarter theft, sharper hedgehogs and better control of the race car.
* Customize your equipment and look like everything you want: a mechanized robot, a boxing champion, a zombie, etc.


HISTORY:
In this shooter game from a third party, you play as a grandiose MMA champion. Substituted by the mafia, you must quit your battle against the fighting event of the year. But if your opponent hits you and hits the bat first, the ideal plan for the famous partisan Frank Velano is also there. You've just become the most wanted person in the city. In the canine world of dogs, where crimes are everywhere, you need to keep weapons to fight the wildest gait of all time!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fate is made, and life is lost with a roll of the cube!

For fans of FPS actions, authors, cars (cars or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with theft of cars and free mobile games.

Keep it up guys! Nice job!

Fun game! Update is great. It's easier to grind towards those PvP cards when you can still make some progress even when losing a match.  Those who say it's now 5 wins for a pack haven't played the update. It's 5 phones destroyed , or 5 life bars taken. So if you lose a sudden death match where you've taken 2 of your opponent's life bars, you still get 2 'wins' towards a PvP reward. You can lose 3 times and get the cards. You don't have to win 3 which can be hard with all the cheaters you encounter.

I want to give this five stars as I really enjoy the gameplay and I'm practically addicted to it. The update has made PvP overall more fun for me as there is less pressure to win, so everyone still gets something out of it whether they win or lose, which I'm happy for. However demanding so much storage space on my phone makes it unplayable even after deleting most of my other apps, music, and photos. I really want to keep playing and this seems to be an issue with other users too. I hope this gets fixed soon

Somehow after the most recent changes I don't get any notifications  about free packs or pvp anymore. They came up fine previously, and I've not changed any settings, but double checked them anyway and seem fine.   I'm not convinced the new pvp changes are an improvement, but hope they'll grow on me. Still enjoying overall, always nice to go on down to South Park.

Broken phone idea. Good But the PvP pairing needs looked at.  Glitches where health jumps back up on characters when no spells cast at all. Really pissed off that PvP is either the opponent does nothing or you can't even get to the other player and I've tried different decks

Lag still in new update. R u running 4k graphics when you mostly on phone or tablet? hate how you want to drag a card but lag doesn't play it and you loose. There are plently of games with quicker response times and equal in appearance graphics. Lame 5 game PvP. How does the leveling even work? Too big gap in skills of opponents.

description: Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it‚Äôs world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball‚Äôs "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!MISSIONThis no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.HOW TO PLAY?To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it‚Äôs exit, which will change it‚Äôs location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet  game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
descriptionHTML:
Core - this is a small lightning"ball" that will pull you in it’s world forever, will open for you cool, exciting offline games of a stylish interface! Download this offline game right now, press the start button, and the lightening ball’s "adventures" in the world of geometric shapes begin!

MISSION

This no Internet game is endless. The goal of the arcade Core is to put a personal record, and even to become # 1 among friends. And to complete a mission and to beat the record you need to fly as fast as possible, bend all obstacles on the way as quickly as you only can and to collect ALL the bonuses (glowing balls) that you only meet on your adventure.

HOW TO PLAY?

To bring a Core into a motion, it's enough just to tap on the screen. The more you press on the screen, the faster it flies.
You need to make this luminous ball fly into the falling figure that rotates and fly of it out. Each figure has one free edge - the entrance to it, in the same time it’s exit, which will change it’s location with the figure rotations . Therefore, get close to the falling figure, when it is turned by the free edge down, and fly out of it when it turns the free edge up. All these manipulations should be done until the figure falls. And this will take just a second and even a half of a second, so you need to be really quick! You can not touch the figures!
First you will face with simple triangles and squares, but the further you go, the harder the construction of figures of this no Internet game are, and the harder it will be to overcome them. Sometimes neither one, nor two, but many figures will move towards you. For example, a combination of stars, or circles, or any other figures that not only rotate about their axis, but they also can move along a completely incomprehensible trajectory, may come upon you. In this case, you have nothing to do but look for the passages between them and as quickly as possible slip across. Just do not forget to collect bonuses - small lightening balls!

Download the arcade CORE RIGHT NOW, but be careful, because you can become addictive to this game!
summary: Tap the screen and join Core's adventures in the world of geometric shapes!

descriptionHTML:
Have a bad mood? Want to make some fun? Express your rage and anger about getting rejected in Rage Face Love Story now!

For the rage boy, life couldn’t be worse – until a sudden return of his old girlfriend after a mysterious disappearance years ago. Help the rage boy win his troll girlfriend back and propose to her in this RAGE FACE love story!

Game Features:
- Rage comic characters with funny cartoon faces like internet memes
- Uncover secrets and solve the prank puzzles in 45+ manually designed levels
- Easy but fun point and click gameplay with no time limit

descriptionHTML:
Built on Unity 3D, Fantasy Blade displays a great Open World of Myth. Choose your favorite champion, start you adventurous journey, meet your side by side friends and create a new history. As a hot-blooded MMORPG mobile game, this grand and legendary game has all sorts of fierce PVP and PVE fighting. Weapons have no limitation for a specific class. Hundreds of weapons including Axe, Dual Blade, Bow and Fists can be switched immediately as per your need.

[Features]

- Grand Open World, Perfected for Mobile –
Fantasy Blade is in a leading place in MMORPG, with detailed characters, fluid animations, large-scale maps and wonderful buildings. The brilliant 3D graphics and special effects put you right in the middle of the battle.

- Advanced Weapon Switching Design –
Unlike other games, Fantasy Blade has no limitation of class and weapon. As per your satisfaction and requirement, you can use any weapons you like.

- Join Your Friends in Fierce Team Battles –
Call up your powerful allies into a battle. Interact with friends and set special tactic against your opponents. Team up with your friends in a guild and soon you will create your own league. Fantasy Blade is the new happy hour for you and your mates.

- Interesting Features for Spare Time –
In Fantasy Blade, when you don’t want to have fierce conflict, just go to God’s Trial, Tower of Babel, BOSS Siege, relaxing Fishing and so on. Fresh funny events will kill your boring time.

- Intense Live PVP Experience–
1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and glory!

COMMUNITY
Visit our official Facebook page and community for the latest news and announcements:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/FantasyBlade
Email: customerservice@rastargames.com
Official Page: ftb.rastargames.com

description: Everyone in this world love his or her school days, always remembering your school days give a smile on your face even in your bad time. Welcome to the virtual school of the vice city in this Gangster Girl in High School simulator, this will remember your teen school days. Where you have to play as a gangster Girl to do all these things with your teachers, principle, bullyboys and with the classmates that you miss out in your school days.Enjoy the most incredible Gangster Girl in High School simulator with incredible missions to play with. Choose your bully school girl to play with, tease everyone in school in the absence of the principal and show that how funny as well as your bully days was. 3D school environment, beautiful classrooms, and tons of students busy in their classwork give you the realistic feeling of your school days. Smooth controls and incredible missions in Gangster Girl in High School simulator made this game addictive.  GAMEPLAY:Get ready to play with the most amazing Gangster Girl in High School simulation with interesting missions. You have to choose your beautiful bully gangster girl to play such amazing missions in virtual school of vice city. Where you have to steal your mark sheet from the principal office and try to escape from the principal of the virtual school.Stand against other bully gangster boys, also steal football from them and do not get caught by him. Pick up the duster from the other classroom while teacher is busy in his lecture, do not caught by the teacher otherwise you have to face punishment from the teacher. Tease the other classmates by your funny movement. Fight with the gangster boys of the school that are disturbing your friend. Many more missions are also waiting in Gangster Girl in High School simulation. 3D graphics and fun gameplay made this game to the best school games. Gangster Girl in High School simulator specially designed for the school games crazier fans and lovers.Gangster Girl in High School Features:‚Ä¢	Choose your wonderful bully girl to play with.‚Ä¢	Irritate your classmates, principal, and teacher.‚Ä¢	Fight with the gangster boys‚Ä¢	Realistic school simulation with smooth controls.‚Ä¢	Steal mark sheet from the principal room.‚Ä¢	3D graphics and amazing camera angles.Gangster Girl in High School simulation contains thrilling and incredible missions, any user love to play such school games. Just grab your favorite virtual school girl to play with and make trouble to everyone with your bad skills. Just make a wonderful entry in the gaming world of Gangster Girl in High School simulation and show how crazy you are in your school days.

description: Play virtual table tennis 3D. A great ping pong game that will make you feel beyond real!If you like to play pingpong or tabletennis, this game is a great racket challenge for you. descriptionHTML:
Play virtual table tennis 3D. A great ping pong game that will make you feel beyond real!
If you like to play pingpong or tabletennis, this game is a great racket challenge for you. Improve your handles, enjoy your freetime and have a sensational feeling of playing table tennis 3D.

Table Tennis 3D Live Ping Pong is an addictive Ping Pong game with superb graphics, effects and awesome soundFX. The best part is that you can play it as in real life, against your friends or the AI. Smash, swing or spin the ball to climb your way up in career mode if you take the table tennis challenge.

If you're a fan of sport games Table Tennis 3D will captivate you with features such as:

● Three Awesome modes

1. Quick Match with three levels of difficulty

✓ Beginner
✓ Intermediate
✓ Expert

2. Career mode - sharpen your table tennis skills at 5 levels

✓ Local Level
✓ State Level
✓ Country Level
✓ Continent Level
✓ International Level

3. Head To Head

✓ Play table tennis in head-to-head mode with your friends (has Facebook/Twitter integration) on the same device

● Smart AI competitor programmed based on human behavior (reaction time, strength, skill, speed etc.)

● Play sidespin, corkspin, smash, lob, flick, loop shot etc. similar to real table tennis modes

● Powerful physics engine gives realistic effects to the ball and bat for better ping pong experience

● Three types of bats/ paddles with configuration available for

✓ Speed
✓ Spin
✓ Control

● Select a bat and ball you feel comfortable playing with based on the different power and spin

● Zoom In/Out the camera while playing the ping pong to change your viewport

● Play table tennis in head-to-head mode with your friends (has Facebook/Twitter integration) on the same device

Table Tennis 3D is the most realistic ping pong simulator for Android and you'll definitely enjoy not only the physics behind, but also its 3D graphics and effects.

Stay updated with Table Tennis 3d Live Ping Pong game news at
http://www.facebook.com/theappguruz
and
http://www.theappguruz.com

If you want to help us translate the description in other languages, please put a mail to us on techadroit2@gmail.com. Thank you.

Keep playing Live Ping Pong with this awesome Table Tennis 3D game.

description: Survival Arena focuses on these key factors: it‚Äôs not about hiring the best troops or winning PvP battles, it‚Äôs about prevailing against all odds! Build mighty towers, upgrade them, and try to hold off hordes of incoming enemies!‚ñ™ Non-stop explosive TD action!‚ñ™ One handed, on-the-go gameplay. ‚ñ™ Play against other players in dozens of tournaments.‚ñ™ Assemble a unique arsenal mix fit just for your style of play.‚ñ™ Race against time against an onslaught of enemies to win against all odds‚ñ™ Choose YOUR strategy, there are many like it, but this one‚Äôs yours.‚ñ™ Full livestream support ‚Äî this game was made to be watched by millions.‚ñ™ Most important of all ‚Äî survive!High in the raging cyclone of thunder and endless gales, a huge flying Arena Ship makes its way across the endless ocean below. The Arena is legendary and surrounded with myths and superstitions. They say it's run by a Captain long lost to madness. A man who has pirated and plundered more than all other captains combined. To have some fun with all the treasures in his late years, he decided to throw the biggest challenge across the floating isles ‚Äî The Survival Arena Tournament.Any Captain brave enough can venture into the eye of the storm, and if fortune turns its favorable side, they will find the arena. descriptionHTML:
Survival Arena focuses on these key factors: it’s not about hiring the best troops or winning PvP battles, it’s about prevailing against all odds! Build mighty towers, upgrade them, and try to hold off hordes of incoming enemies!

▪ Non-stop explosive TD action!
▪ One handed, on-the-go gameplay.
▪ Play against other players in dozens of tournaments.
▪ Assemble a unique arsenal mix fit just for your style of play.
▪ Race against time against an onslaught of enemies to win against all odds
▪ Choose YOUR strategy, there are many like it, but this one’s yours.
▪ Full livestream support — this game was made to be watched by millions.
▪ Most important of all — survive!

High in the raging cyclone of thunder and endless gales, a huge flying Arena Ship makes its way across the endless ocean below. The Arena is legendary and surrounded with myths and superstitions. They say it's run by a Captain long lost to madness. A man who has pirated and plundered more than all other captains combined. To have some fun with all the treasures in his late years, he decided to throw the biggest challenge across the floating isles — The Survival Arena Tournament.

Any Captain brave enough can venture into the eye of the storm, and if fortune turns its favorable side, they will find the arena. Thousands have tried to beat the challenges and survive, but none could beat the records. It’s time for a new challenger to accept the challenge of the Arena and to become the Grand Champion.

Survive if you dare.

Privacy policy: http://www.game-insight.com/site/privacypolicy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.game-insight.com/site/terms
recentChanges: Update 2.6 is now live ‚Äì check out what's new an grab it!

ARENAS will now generate same enemy waves for all players. This means that you can predictably try to reach your best score ‚Äì or wait a bit, and try again with different wave pattern. Waves will be refreshed every 3 hours after the tournament launches ‚Äì good luck with your strategies! Let us know what you think about this change.
See full patch notes on our Facebook page: fb.com/SurvivalArena
summary: Non-stop explosive TD action!
title: Survival Arena

comments: Best Drag racing game in Google play store. If you have a addictive personality don't play it. I do suffer from that first race was on Dec 312017 as of Feb 22, 2018 I have 208 hrs on the track 23 in the garage own 22 cars and spent over a Benjamin on it in less than a month. Ya gotta have some smarts to play and win. Money helps with extras. Only time I've had a issue with it was this morning a season ended I was upgrading a Tier 5 car and paid with game money and didn't receive part. Still a 10 star game... Great job Developers!!

Really really addicted. Yes you know when your good. Yes you do.  Ok honest? Expand on the shop.  Tweaking the appearance and performance of the rides.  Everyone has their own way of saying, yes that's how I would if I really could.  You end up creating a bond or developing a relationship  with it.  Take it to the next level!  Gear ratios and n02 pushezes and grip are all good but let's envelop.  I know I would play more if I could truly express my kickass whip that represents  me that I have to drive!  You have a clean and immersive game. Less is more.  Thank you

Customer support has won me over. They have literally provided the best resolution can think of for the game removing all my fusion parts. Hopefully I don't have many issues in the future but this one time moment has definitely filled me with confidence that in future, zynga will fairly sort things out.

Game is really great! Amazing graphics, amazing cars, lots of continuous fun! A few bugs and connection issues which can be frustrating at times especially when your team depends on you for points. Though I believe they'll eventually fix these issues as this is the BEST racing game out there and it's only getting BETTER!

Love the new updates where you can carry on the trials without having to go back to the garage. It would be nice to able to trade up your keys i.e 500 bronze for 10 silver or 100 silver for 1 gold. And the stage 6 upgrades be not double up or get stage 6 upgrades relevant to the cars you have.

This game is a rip off don't bother playing. Doesn't work but 10% of the time.any New content will  cost $20 Live races disconnect constantly. and if you want any of the new cars to do special events better be ready to drop $20. Been playing for a couple months and I always get bet by players that spend lots of real world cash. Good game but it needs lots of work and needs to be less pay to win. Don't bother writing support if something comes up missing or you don't get your rewards either you'll get some Bs answer about what going on if they decide to answer you and they don't even attempt to make it right or fix the game. But they're really good about adding cars you have to buy to race.

Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.‚Ä¢ Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.‚Ä¢ Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.DOMINATE THE CITY‚Ä¢ Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.‚Ä¢ Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

And finally, Donna Banks is delivering the Jeep Grand Cherokee Trackhawk!
summary: Race your way to the top of the leaderboards in your custom supercar with CSR2!
title: CSR Racing 2

comments: I can not get this game to work. It says 'Your hardware does not support this application'. This has happened with a few other fireman games. I have a new Sony XZ Premium phone so I don't understand why it won't work. Can anyone tell me if I can resolve this problem?
Good game, slightly annoying at times to control movement of the characters, tend to become awkward when trying to stay in straight line. Other than that is a good game to pass the time!

This game is not good. All you do is drive to a circle so an animation takes over while the avatar rescues a cat from a tree. Or you pull in to a circle and tap the screen a couple times to close a valve. You move from circle to circle being stuck in one spot at each one. There is very limited movement during tasks. And then on top of it you do all kinds of non-firefighter tasks. Clearing logs from a street? Really? That's a public works job. Closing a water valve? That's utilities. Rescuing a cat? Come on. That's animal control. Firefighters don't actually rescue cats from trees. And the missions are short. Pretty sure I finished the game in 20 minutes.
Made for kids....and made for them to accidentally click the rediculous amount of adds
Very good game we get a good experience of firefighters

description: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.
descriptionHTML:
Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.

One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.

Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.
foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.

Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.
Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.
summary: Climb using two buttons, improve your skill, and reach as high as you can.
title: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket - Free

comments: DDs are OP as heck, torpedoes detonate meters away from the ship (useless trying to dodge between them) and all ships seem to float like UFOs which makes it very difficult to predict where you need to aim in advance.  I really wnt to like this game and see it become better but currently it has many teething issues.

The game is a joke, cuz 1. the time is too short, 2. Maps are tiny, we meet enemies face to face 3. Nothing like the pc version 4. Needs all the ships got on pc version 5. ship turning is picullier to physics. 6. Low exp reward. Much lower.
Good game, perfect for long term play both at home and work. Only complaint is torpedoes are over powered and hit box too large. That's why I give it 3 stars
When I first started this game I didn't know what to think. But now! I really love it and it's fun, cool, makes me get a sense for the navy. Which I'm trying to go into.

Destroyers are overpowered!!! I give a destroyer 2 or 3 broadsides with my tier V Kongo and only 4k damage... and then of course I get nailed with 6 to12 torpedoes that do 3k damage each. Destroyers need a massive nerf. Very bad

I like the game but please get rid of using blueprints to research ship upgrades! I mean what's wrong with xp? Getting blueprints you need is completely random and as far as I know not effected by your performance.

description: Mountain Assault Shooting ArenaReload Your Assault Gun, More Enemy Army Troopers are Coming.Welcome to a brand new shooting game of 2018. The enemy has swarmed in the jungle and are conducting offensive strikes against our country. The armed forces cannot engage with any full fledge frontline pvp battle. Because this could rage war between two countries. But this thing need to be tackled within no time to stop cover strike commando. The enemy has also build up hideouts and are attacking from behind. Now the strategic reply should be given from our side by our commando. For this, the high command has hired a commando to crush the enemy forces. You have to play the character of war strike commando. Your ultimate duty is to retaliate the enemy attack. The jungle is very dense with a lot of cover, so war strike commando needs to be very careful.The gameplay of this game is very thrilling. Players of every age will definitely enjoy with dozens of sequenced frontline pvp battle levels. The initial missions are very easy as compared to last ones. Because the difficulty level increases as you proceed more inside the war strike commando game. You are the only best man to conduct operation in a jungle swarming with hostile forces. There are different weapons in the armory that you can use in cover strike commando game. But only primary gun is available and you have to buy other stuff. The mission tasks are different in each mission of this covert ops commando game. This will definitely test your shooting skills to a whole new level. Furthermore, the gadget includes mini radar to show your position on the ground in this covert ops commando game. You will also get paid with cash on completing each mission. Spend it to buy new weapons, med packs and grenades to win cover strike commando game. You should be prepared every moment, because the enemy is battle hardened and well trained.The controls of this frontline pvp battle game are very easy. Even players of every age will enjoy their spare time with fun. The button placement is ideal in this war strike commando game. You have one section for movement and other to perform actions. The action buttons include fire, reload, change stance and miscellaneous to provide ease of playing this commando pvp shooting game. You can also have a strategic look via radar showing enemy positions. So paly more and enhance your experience in commando pvp shooting games.Best of Luck‚Ä¶! description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making

descriptionHTML:
Real Moto Rider Racing is an exciting and challenging motorcycle racing game, the expressway traffic brings you the world's most eye-catching, most satisfying traffic escape experience!

Endless game
As fast as possible the speed of driving and racing, becoming the world's best motorcycle driver! Ride your motorbike, drive on endless busy roads and highways, escape the vehicle and complete the challenge. Compete with professional racers. Take a variety of scenes and enjoy this real driving experience, but do not relax, the road is full of high-speed cars, you must be careful to avoid these vehicles.

Rich road environment
Freeway traffic is becoming the new standard for traffic racing. Enjoy stunning graphics and experience high-performance motorcycles! You will find that this will make you feel different from the racing game that allows you to enjoy the fun of motorcycles.

High-performance motorcycle
Have you ever thought about riding a motorcycle in reality? In this as long as you have enough technology, you can control all kinds of cool high quality motorcycles. All kinds of epic motorcycle waiting for you to conquer.

Customize your motorcycle
Go to the garage and choose your favorite motorcycle. Adjust the vehicle and customize its appearance. Choose your favorite color and make your ride more of your own style. You can also modify your motorcycle to enhance the performance of motorcycles, so you better enjoy the speed.

Real Moto Rider Racing Features:
- Enjoy the ultimate 3D visual effects
- Drive your motorcycle on the freeway
- a variety of epic motorcycle for you to choose
- Refine your motorcycle, upgrade your speed, has a variety of performance
- show your driving skills in the face of various challenges
- a variety of real scenes and environment
- shocking sound, so you better experience the game
developerAddress: Luk Yu Building, 24-26 Stanley Street, Central, Hong Kong
summary: Driving a motorcycle, driving on a busy road, avoiding high-speed vehicles
title: Real Moto Rider Racing

There is a big closet full of these , so there is no limit, just your imagination . Pick the yellow or the red dress and be sure that you will have the perfect shoes or purse for them. Do not forget about jewellery or the fur coat - these will complete your very elegant look for New Year evening.Princess Makeup Games features :- easy to play for all those girls that like princess dress up games- a nice makeup salon with all cosmetics for a beautiful skin - a colorful makeup box for this kind of princess makeup games- a big closet with elegant dresses and accessories for princess dress up games- shining jewellery witch you make you look like a pretty princessWe think that you can help us to improve our makeup salon games, so write in your comments your opinion about this kind of princess dress up games. ***** JurassicCraft is a free sandbox game *****

JurassicCraft - an exciting adventure with prehistoric reptiles in the cubic universe!

Game Features

• Face many different dinosaurs.

Image, you are in the Jurassic Park, swarmed by prehistoric wild animals. There are herbivorous and carnivore dinosaurs like Spinosaurus, Therizinosaurus, Nanuqsaurus, Kentrosaurus, and many others.

This cleaning app will teach you about the ways to clean the house and to be a perfectionist.

Cleaning the house in your way the rooms, the hall, the kitchen, the bathrooms, and the whole house cleaning game. Cleaning the house Cleaning is usually done from top to bottom, i.e. dust from the top of the curtains to the underside, kitchen cabinets cleaning the top floor and bottom and so on, and from the right to the left, which must be cleaned.

Make the bathroom look cleaner and shiny, and facilitate the process of cleaning the bathroom weekly and monthly.

It's no secret that keeping your home clean and neat requires a great deal of time and energy, whether you live in a one-bedroom apartment or a four-bedroom house. These days, our schedules are so busy that it takes real dedication to set aside enough time for a thorough top-to-bottom cleaning.

You don’t have to wait until spring to give your house a good cleaning! In-House Cleaning Day, clean up your house and get rid of the things which you don’t need. First, clean up all the rooms of your house from the kitchen to the bedroom and lastly your fish aquarium. Wipe up dust, vacuum the floors, and throw away junk! Leave nothing dirty and fix anything that’s broken.

comments: I loved it. One of the best games that I have played yet. So addictive that I could not stop playing it way up into the night. I also liked the fact that there wasn't any hints. You have to pretty much figure it out for your self. The only thing that I didn't like is that there is not enough stages. The game should have been longer. Please install a couple of more levels.

Wonderful game. The only thing would be if you could give a little hint now and then, it would be really nice. I only say this because I spent half of the time just tapping randomly around my screen hoping for something to happen. But, I digress, awesome game. Also pkease add more levels soon.

Smart and challenging!!! And the graphic is really good. Unfortunately there were only 5 scenarios, not that they were that easy, but really I need more. I think I'm getting addicted to it. Lol. Please, make an update, I dont mind if I have to pay: it's worth it. Great job for the developers, really love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è

It is a very interesting game idea and I like the implementation. But, it has some gameplay issues that should be fixed. If I decide to do an action first instead of another, I will not be able to continue. I could not find the screwdriver in the garage because I had turned off the lights. And so I decided to replay the level, but the game's only option was to start from the beginning of the game.

Great game! Puzzles are actually tricky and may take several attempts. The voice over is the only flaw for me, sounds auto generated and fake. Has 5 missions in total so will keep you occupied for some time but possible to play through all of them in about 2 to 3 hours.

The best puzzle game. It is really awesome, i recommend all gamers who love investigate games to play this, i pretty sure u all like it. It's graphics is good. Just a game for boring times. Really appreciate to your work guys, a big thumbs up üëçfrom me. Keep it up :-)

descriptionHTML:
A first-person point-and-click adventure in cleaning up dirty work. Killing is easy. Cleaning up is hard...

Mark had a promising future at his father's law firm, until one of his cases got him too close to a top-secret government project. After discovering classified information related to a terrifying biological weapon, he was quickly arrested and falsely imprisoned for treason.

Five years later, an unknown benefactor has orchestrated Mark's release, with a catch: he must help eliminate all traces of the very project that led to his arrest.

As member after member of the mysterious initiative is eliminated by unknown hands, it's up to Mark to ensure that no loose ends—and no bodies—remain.

Features
• A first-person point-and-click adventure featuring four unique missions
• A thrilling story packed with intrigue
• Countless brain-bending puzzles
• Free to play (includes an in-app purchase to remove ads)
• 35+ scenes across multiple locations
• Based on a true story

Follow us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/nobodiesgame

Visit our site
https://www.blyts.com/nobodies
summary: A challenging adventure in cleaning up dirty work.

descriptionHTML:
RoboCraft is a sandbox construction game with 3D procedurally generated world.

*** GAME FEATURES ***
• 3D Sandbox construction game;
• Huge world to explore;
• Craft and destroy everything;
• Build your own shelter;
• Go deep into the mines;
• Gather resources to survive;
• Fight your enemies;
• Creative mode to set your imagination free. 

Create and break apart various kinds of blocks, explore the environment, gather resources, craft weapons, build shelter and take part in combat with dangerous opponents.

The game offers two modes – Survival and Creative.
- In Survival players have to collect resources, construct buildings, fight against enemies, manage hunger and explore the word to survive and prosper.
- In Creative mode you focus on breaking new grounds of creation by building the most elaborate structures you can dream of.

RoboCraft is a game for adults and kids, it will entertain you for a long time and earn an unforgettable experience.

comments: G-R-E-A-T Game This is a wonderful game for kids,I would say age 4 n up! There are so many mini games it DEFINITELY helps keep kids/adults busy, when going somewhere there maybe a waiting period! KIDS are CONSTANTLY wanting new games!  This having so many games N 1, kids get into it n think it's a new game! Also a + that no matter how many times U play the game U ALWAYS get your coins/points even if U didn't WIN n also after U try to beat a game 5times in a roll U also get extra COINS/POINTS!

Fun little mini games I have a small child, so short games like this are better for me. It would be 5 stars if the games were less points or you get points more easily. The first couple boards are fine, but after that it's too many points. I get bored and lose interest.

description: Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone? Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house?  Find out what really goes on when you‚Äôre not home!  Discover your puppy‚Äôs secret life - and get ready to party! Features:> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies! > Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it‚Äôs a secret! > Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she‚Äôll repeat what you say!> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories. > Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks! > Care for your pet puppy when she‚Äôs sick. description: Space Shooter, STRIKER is two-dimensional fixed shooter war game.In the galactic, the player controls a spaceship by moving it and firing at descending aliens. Like a sky destroyer, the aim is to defeat space shuttle of invaders. The player defeats sky invader, and earns points, by shooting it with the squadron . As more aliens are defeated, the aliens movement and the game's music both speed up. Defeating the aliens brings another wave that is more difficult, a loop which can continue without end.Space Shooter attempt to destroy your spacecraft by firing at it while they approach the bottom of the screen. descriptionHTML:
Space Shooter, STRIKER is two-dimensional fixed shooter war game.

In the galactic, the player controls a spaceship by moving it and firing at descending aliens. Like a sky destroyer, the aim is to defeat space shuttle of invaders. The player defeats sky invader, and earns points, by shooting it with the squadron . As more aliens are defeated, the aliens movement and the game's music both speed up. Defeating the aliens brings another wave that is more difficult, a loop which can continue without end.

Space Shooter attempt to destroy your spacecraft by firing at it while they approach the bottom of the screen. If they reach the bottom, the alien invasion is successful and the game ends. A special "mystery ship" will occasionally move across the top of the screen and award bonus points if destroyed. Your spacecraft is partially protected by several stationary defense bunkers that are gradually destroyed by a numerous amount of blasts from the invaders or player

If you are fan of classic Galaxy game, you must play Space Shooter: Galactic Force now and become a hero protect your galactic that your destiny.

★ ★ ★ Features ★ ★ ★

- Charming sound and music, with HD graphics.
- Precision controls.
- Space shooter and upgrade your weapons: wingman support, vulcan camon, energy shield ...
- Invaders of 12 big boss.
- Classic Galaxy game and complete 30 achievement.
- Classic Galaxy game with 4 spaceship with another power: rocket, laser and strongest soldiers.
summary: Space Shooter: Galactic Force make you become a hero raiden protect your galaxy!
title: Space Shooter: Galaxy Force

description: Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is unique in the girl games collection because you can race in a dress up contest.We've carefuly selected the best we've found regarding dressup games with some updates and we've created an exceptional fashion game in which you need to carefully choose designer clothes for all kind of themes like a walk in the park or an appropiate school dress up outfit.Everything is against time and you must choose between lots of combinations of clothes and accesories to create the perfect outfit.After you finish the outfit design , the jury in dress up battle will assign the winning fashionista.The winning fashionista will be chosen based on 3 marks given by different persons and the marks will be given for originality, right colors , theme chosen and matching clothes.If you think that a simple jeans dress will help you win this dress up contest , it means that you have the wrong opinion about the competition you are in.Either you wish to become a designer for fashion houses or a successful model , Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is the perfect place in which you have to test your fashionista skills and create adequate outfits for different ocassions and all under the surveilance of fashion experts and of course , against time.After creating her account , every fashionista that wants to participate at our dress up contest will have to choose a theme for which it has to design the perfect outfit and to be able to enter the contest it has to put some coins in play.If you win the contest you will earn coins , but if you don't create the winning outfit you will loose coins in the dress up contest.So , girls , we wish you goodluck in Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game , may the best fashionista win !Game Features:- over 200 possible dressup outfits- play against any random dressup fashionista- choose from 10 different fashion games- incredible fashion game items and different gameplay themes to chose from
descriptionHTML:
Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is unique in the girl games collection because you can race in a dress up contest.

We've carefuly selected the best we've found regarding dressup games with some updates and we've created an exceptional fashion game in which you need to carefully choose designer clothes for all kind of themes like a walk in the park or an appropiate school dress up outfit.

Everything is against time and you must choose between lots of combinations of clothes and accesories to create the perfect outfit.

After you finish the outfit design , the jury in dress up battle will assign the winning fashionista.

The winning fashionista will be chosen based on 3 marks given by different persons and the marks will be given for originality, right colors , theme chosen and matching clothes.
If you think that a simple jeans dress will help you win this dress up contest , it means that you have the wrong opinion about the competition you are in.

Either you wish to become a designer for fashion houses or a successful model , Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game is the perfect place in which you have to test your fashionista skills and create adequate outfits for different ocassions and all under the surveilance of fashion experts and of course , against time.

After creating her account , every fashionista that wants to participate at our dress up contest will have to choose a theme for which it has to design the perfect outfit and to be able to enter the contest it has to put some coins in play.

If you win the contest you will earn coins , but if you don't create the winning outfit you will loose coins in the dress up contest.

So , girls , we wish you goodluck in Dress Up Battle : Fashion Game , may the best fashionista win !

Game Features:
- over 200 possible dressup outfits
- play against any random dressup fashionista
- choose from 10 different fashion games
- incredible fashion game items and different gameplay themes to chose from

description: Founded in 1999 by UAE Vice President, Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Zayed International Prize for the Environment is meant to recognize and encourage environmental achievements supporting and promoting the implementation of Agenda 21, Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) and the Johannesburg Plan of Implementation for Sustainable Development, in line with the vision and philosophy of the late Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan.        The prestigious award of this Foundation is worth US$ 1 million, but the scope is not limited to Prize awards. The foundation endeavors to promote sustainable development through various environmental initiatives and through propagating environmental awareness, addressing sustainability issues, conducting international and regional conferences, workshops and seminars, raising consciousness among the public, professionals, trade and the fraternity; in addition to publications and community activities

comments: I don't see what's so great about this game. All you do is run around, kill people, and collect coins. I'm seeing all these reviews saying "great game bad controls," and I'm convinced that they're fake accounts created by the devs. The game sucks and holds no substance, but the controls are just fine. I've played the "updated" version, but it's the exact same thing; run around, kill things, and collect coins.

BEWARE My son downloaded this game on his tablet, and the first time he played this game, it completely crashed and wiped out his tablet, and we cannot get it to load past the first screen that shows the brand of the tablet.  It is no longer usable.  Very disappointing.  His tablet is less than two months old.
I love this game!! This is so fun! I'm already at level 3. I like how you can go to so many did fret places! The weird though is that I don't kill the women xddddd

Would have rated it a five I love the game but the problem here is it's hard to maneuver the screen when trying to get a view from behind, also sometimes when trying to get through some of the tunnels in the cave it sometimes would stop you from entering can you fix this? If not I'm ok but another problem is sometimes in the timed cave number ten you can't find any people to kill so you just die trying. I don't see a point of trying to kill 30 people when there's none to be found. I have died and not passed this level because of this problem.

Has potential What i would add to make this app award worthy: Add different types, sizes, or colors of werewolves, rag doll effects, dismemberment options in settings, an animation of the transformation at the beginning of each level, and it would be fun if there was a mode where you could infect people. Good game, but needs updates in gameplay if it's ever going to be worth paying money to download.

Intrusive ads and poor lighting The first and fourth levels are extremely annoying due to horrible lighting. I get that it's in a cave but it's very easy to get into awkward positions where you have to wildly flail the camera around to find out where you are... While ads keep randomly covering the screen. Not a bad game but the cave levels ruin it due to being purely frustrating.

description: Thanks for our fans' love and great suggestions to our last two versions of Counter Terrorist - Critical Strike(CT-CS).Here we present the Counter Terrorist 2-Trigger(sister version of Counter Terrorist 2-Gun Strike)Key Features:‚òëAs part of our players like the "auto shoot", but the other part don't like it, so here we present the Counter Terrorist 2-Trigger, we add "trigger" button by default, but when you think it's too hard to use, you can still turn on the "auto shoot".‚òëWe also turn off "In App Purchase" in this version, as it can be played by players from the countries where they can not play this game before.2.0 New Features:‚òëYou can turn "Auto Shoot" ON/OFF in battle.‚òëYou can modify "Aim Sensitivity" in pause button.‚òëMore weapons, in 2.0 we have 20 weapons, some are really the "monsters":)‚òëMore levels, in 2.0 we added 2 more levels which contain gorgeous environment.‚òëMore smart enemies, in 2.0 we will face much smarter enemies, you'd better not despise them.‚òëHarder level means more rewards.Game control:‚òëLeft 1/3 screen is for moving,right 2/3 screen is for aiming.‚òëWhen you aim the target,your weapon will fire automatially,giving you a much easier FPS game control.‚òëYou can prepare your bullets before battling,or auto buy bullet in the battle.Game tips‚òëYou can tweak your control sensivity in your pause menu,fit all the android devices here.‚òëAuto buying bullets in the battle,save your precious time‚òëAim the head,give your enemy the critical strike!‚òëEnemies' life and damage grows when you select a harder level.Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Thanks for our fans' love and great suggestions to our last two versions of Counter Terrorist - Critical Strike(CT-CS).
Here we present the Counter Terrorist 2-Trigger(sister version of Counter Terrorist 2-Gun Strike)

Key Features:

☑As part of our players like the "auto shoot", but the other part don't like it, so here we present the Counter Terrorist 2-Trigger, we add "trigger" button by default, but when you think it's too hard to use, you can still turn on the "auto shoot".

☑We also turn off "In App Purchase" in this version, as it can be played by players from the countries where they can not play this game before.



2.0 New Features:

☑You can turn "Auto Shoot" ON/OFF in battle.

☑You can modify "Aim Sensitivity" in pause button.

☑More weapons, in 2.0 we have 20 weapons, some are really the "monsters":)

☑More levels, in 2.0 we added 2 more levels which contain gorgeous environment.

☑More smart enemies, in 2.0 we will face much smarter enemies, you'd better not despise them.

☑Harder level means more rewards.



Game control:

☑Left 1/3 screen is for moving,right 2/3 screen is for aiming.

☑When you aim the target,your weapon will fire automatially,giving you a much easier FPS game control.

☑You can prepare your bullets before battling,or auto buy bullet in the battle.


Game tips

☑You can tweak your control sensivity in your pause menu,fit all the android devices here.

☑Auto buying bullets in the battle,save your precious time

☑Aim the head,give your enemy the critical strike!

☑Enemies' life and damage grows when you select a harder level.




Enjoy!
developerAddress: Terry Street, Blockhouse Bay Auckland , New Zealand
summary: one of best FPS games 2.0
title: Counter Terrorist 2-Trigger

Play in the pony dream house and take care of a little pink baby pony! Splash water in a bubble bath, mash green peas, change diapers, put her to bed and have sweet dreams!

Become the best baby pony nanny and take care of the cute pink baby pony girl. Spend the whole day playing lovely baby pony dress up games for kids, change smelly diapers, prepare delicious puree and baby pony bottles, and have sweet little dreams at night!

Pony Sisters Baby Horse Care baby pony games for kids:
· Take care of the cutest baby pony girl all day!
· Splash water, pop the bubbles, wash, clean and have fun in the bath!
· Dress up with the fancy little baby pony clothes and add the cutest head accessories!
· Prepare the most delicious pea puree, baby pony formula and feed her!
· Change smelly diapers, clean baby pony and make her happy!
· Put the cutest pink baby pony to bed and play bedtime rhymes!
· Dream about a baby pony princess, a fairy and a pop star!
· Catch the birds, fly over the flower meadow and pop musical notes in your dreams!
· Watch videos for kids and toddlers to get bonus coins!


Free & Paid Game Content
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.
You can play Bedtime, Pea Puree and Dress Up mini games for free.
You can purchase separate mini games (Bubble Bath, Diapers and Formula) or the full game version with no ads.
