comments: Yeyah! I love getting to be the necromancer! You immediately get thrusted into a position of great power, without explanation. Now, it worked well here, cuz it fit the rest of the game nicely. I remember hearing once that "Story in video games is like story in (elicit film). It's expected to be there, but nobody cares about it." You don't expect much, so what you get is nice. There's a certain lack of care as you play, like the cold pusher of the dead, you are. The feeling of progress really ramps up once the player can raise a second minion, and it's great! You get exactly what it seems like, which is something to behold at the moment.

This game..is something else. I love the game, eerie and mystical, but I sometimes have trouble pressing the attack and defense buttons. Like, they don't work too well. Also, for each level, could you make different backgrounds? That would be great. All-in-all, this game is great!

OH MY GOD!!! This is what we called revolution, this game is not like any others game on android. It is so thrilled to play, so fun, so GREAT, I search for "Necromancer" (A game that can raise the dead/summon/companion/etc) and lastly I found this game! Thank You KANG-SUNG PARK for this game!. This is my suggestion and experiences from other game, if you ADD new features, more thing, any other element, like you can summon other type of Zombies or anything that is Necromancer type, and what about rise up the CHARISMA more than usual. You can look up at "Zombie Knight 1 & 2" for GREAT features, because when I played this game the feeling is exactly like when playing "Zombie Knight 1 & 2". Please response to my comment, I REALLY REALLY REALLY LIKES YOU GAMES!!!!!! AHHHHHH!!!! PLEASE do consider my comment :D   -Master_K

This game is dark, action filled, and all around fun. I think one of the darkest aspects of gameplay is how your enemies will beg for mercy and scream for help when dying. The movement controls are a little wierd thouh, to run you double tap the joystick which they never tell you. Definetly a must try.

After finishing the first normal mode story I'd say it's a really well-made game. Lovely graphics (I just have one suggestion: remove the 'static' effect from the intro before the player's first death), no significant clipping issues, maybe kinda monotonous but it fits the mood of the game.

It's good game at its core. The gameplay is fun but repetitive. The story is OK. Sadly, it is a cliche from any dark book. Travel back in time, betrayal, go to hell etc and also, the main character is irritatingly stupid. Like.. his IQ is a negative. Not sure if this is intentional, but still.. Good game!

comments: Well how about the fact that you can only play half of the game, then you have to buy the other half of the levels.  Even buying the levels, the game on a whole, was a bit cr*ppy so I wouldn't waste my money. Maybe Goblin LLC,  should say that you have to buy almost 10 levels. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion so mine is: the game was bad. üòà

I wish these dumb ass games tell you that you can only play 9 levels before you have to buy the rest of the game. Having to pay for any part of the game means it's not free like you claim it is. Don't waste your time with this game.
Well, I bought the 1st package for a dollar and played level 10 and I opened it this morning and the levels 10-12 are locked again. Wasted a dollar. Don't waste your time with this. Uninstalling

Once you pass level 9, you have to pay for VIP. I don't like this and am uninstalling this app because of it. This was supposed to be a  free app. This is very disappointing, for I liked this app. I have been playing it all weekend, and just now passed level 9, which then said if I wanted to continue, i would have to pay for VIP. I am appointing any one who is going to get this app, to not, because of this. It is very dissappointing. The graphics however, are excellent, same with the gameplay. If you're stuck ok a level, you can click the lightbulb and it will bring you to a YouTube video showing you how to get through the level which I found really useful, because these levels are pretty difficult. If you read all this, wow. Good job. And thank you for listening to my advice.  And Goblin LLC, I wish you did better and thought of others when making the VIP part. I won't be downloading any more of your apps.   Thank you.

It is very challenging yet very fun. I finished 1-9 in a couple of hours. I do not like the fact that I cannot do 1-18, though. Plus, there are too many advertisments.  Overall, the game was extrordinary and very relaxing and satisfying, but you guys should limit the adds and give us more free levels to do. Thanks!
Ad placement is too distracting, graphics not that impressive even for being free.

description: It was a great idea to set up a popcorn stand on the street! Now you're going to have lots of customers with different kinds of orders! Help the public get some snacks and go crazy by feeding them their favorite snacks!How To Play ?- Dig up the farm land and seed the corn plants. - Water the veggies and take care of the farm. - Harvest the crops. Pluck the ripe corn and fill them in the boxes for delivery truck.- Put the corn in to the machine and extract the corn grains.- Cleanup and wash the grains to remove rotten grains.- Dry the corn pass it through the high temperature dryers.- Add caramel, sweetener, cheese and other flavor in the plant. - Heat it up for few hours and the delicious popcorns are ready for eat !!Kids will love to bake and make popcorn in the factory. Work as a popcorn factory worker and make popcorn in large factory plants and machineries. This game will let you learn the whole process of popcorn making, from growing corn plants in the farmer farm to cooking of popcorn in factory machine plants.!Running a business can be a fun and challenging thing, and with this Popcorn maker game you can know just what it's like to own your own popcorn factory! First you have to collect the mais, then prepare the ingredients and soon you will have some really delicious popcorns...Suggestions from parents are considered as part of our regular development process. You can send us your compliments/feedback on itechnuts@gmail.com.For contact details see - http://www.itechnuts.com
descriptionHTML:
It was a great idea to set up a popcorn stand on the street! Now you're going to have lots of customers with different kinds of orders! Help the public get some snacks and go crazy by feeding them their favorite snacks!

How To Play ?

- Dig up the farm land and seed the corn plants.
- Water the veggies and take care of the farm.
- Harvest the crops. Pluck the ripe corn and fill them in the boxes for delivery truck.
- Put the corn in to the machine and extract the corn grains.
- Cleanup and wash the grains to remove rotten grains.
- Dry the corn pass it through the high temperature dryers.
- Add caramel, sweetener, cheese and other flavor in the plant.
- Heat it up for few hours and the delicious popcorns are ready for eat !!

Kids will love to bake and make popcorn in the factory. Work as a popcorn factory worker and make popcorn in large factory plants and machineries. This game will let you learn the whole process of popcorn making, from growing corn plants in the farmer farm to cooking of popcorn in factory machine plants.!

Running a business can be a fun and challenging thing, and with this Popcorn maker game you can know just what it's like to own your own popcorn factory! First you have to collect the mais, then prepare the ingredients and soon you will have some really delicious popcorns...

Suggestions from parents are considered as part of our regular development process. You can send us your compliments/feedback on itechnuts@gmail.com.
For contact details see - http://www.itechnuts.com
summary: Popcorn Maker! Be a popcorn factory worker & make popcorn in large factories.
title: Popcorn Factory! Popcorn Maker

description: How to Make Spider HandHow to Make a Hand of a Spider - an instruction to create a spider's arm!Have you dreamed of possessing super ability?Everyone thought about it!It's time to turn dreams into reality!This appendix details how to make a device for shooting spiderweb!Everything is not as difficult as it seems!Three variants of execution are presented!In the first case, we need tubes made of paper of different diameters!Support frame, also made of paper!Two mounts on the arm!Two piston mechanisms and a hitch!The lower piston together with the hitch forms the trigger mechanism, for which the upper piston is fixed!The upper piston will push out a shell made of paper and a white thread!Look carefully at the pictures and follow the instructions! Press the trigger!The second way is similar to the first!We need several tubes of different diameters, made of paper!The third option and other the most difficult, you will learn in the game!We fasten the mechanism to the fastening and everything is ready!Spinning all your friends with a spider's hand! Feel yourself a hero!Now you jokingly can shoot cobwebs like a spider!Share the app with your friends and have fun together!Start to invent right now!Leave your comments and ratings!Invent with us!
descriptionHTML:
How to Make Spider Hand
How to Make a Hand of a Spider - an instruction to create a spider's arm!
Have you dreamed of possessing super ability?
Everyone thought about it!
It's time to turn dreams into reality!
This appendix details how to make a device for shooting spiderweb!
Everything is not as difficult as it seems!
Three variants of execution are presented!

In the first case, we need tubes made of paper of different diameters!
Support frame, also made of paper!
Two mounts on the arm!
Two piston mechanisms and a hitch!
The lower piston together with the hitch forms the trigger mechanism, for which the upper piston is fixed!
The upper piston will push out a shell made of paper and a white thread!
Look carefully at the pictures and follow the instructions! Press the trigger!

The second way is similar to the first!
We need several tubes of different diameters, made of paper!

The third option and other the most difficult, you will learn in the game!

We fasten the mechanism to the fastening and everything is ready!

Spinning all your friends with a spider's hand! Feel yourself a hero!
Now you jokingly can shoot cobwebs like a spider!
Share the app with your friends and have fun together!
Start to invent right now!

Leave your comments and ratings!
Invent with us!
summary: How to Make Spider Hand
title: How to Make Spider Hand

description: Bicycle racing is one of the earliest form of road racing and have most numbers of competitors, events and spectators. Get ready to take another journey and enjoy an amazing bicycle ride around the beautiful city. This bicycle racing simulator 2017 gives you extreme offroad bicycle driving and luxury bicycle driving experience. The beautiful animations of bicycle accidents and bicycle stunts 2017 gives you realistic feel of offroad bicycle driving experience.This game gives you bicycle training driving which is the best offroad bicycle driving school simulator 2017 feature. This bicycle driving school teaches you how to drive and control bicycle on a racing track and compete other racers by applying special tricks. These driving training school helps you a lot in this game. Bicycle racing is real arcade game in which you are going to ride bicycles on uphill terrain. Bicycle hill climb is very difficult. while when you are riding from hills it feels like you are bike flying in beautiful meadows. Bicycles in mountainous and hilly areas is reached by special offroad heavy truck transport cargo. If you want to participate in this cycling race you have to cargo your cycle. There are few service stations and few car mechanic workshops or bike mechanic workshops in these hilly areas, so if you want to repair or modify your bicycle you have to go to them before the race. There are also few truck stop or bus stop and bus station from where you can ask for bicycle modification. This game is all about racing unlike other games like 6x6 truck driving or which involves parking like multi storey car parking, luxury bike parking, multi storey mall parking or multi storey parking. In this game you are going to experience thrilling and exciting bicycle racing. This bicycle event is held near army training school for new driver. So army bike drivers also going to take part in this event. If you want to win this race be aware of army bike driving. During bicycling you may encounter with trucks like army transporter truck. Use them for drafting.This extremely convincing bicycle rider game is packed with different levels. It‚Äôs time to superintend other racing games and enjoy this excellent sports bicycle rider racing in one of the modern next generation bicycle racing mania games.Game Features:- A real Life Cycle Simulation - Perfect & Realistic Bicycle Controls- Day & Night Mode - Obstacles to avoid - Smooth Controls- Breath taking & Stunning Hill Mountain Environment- Free Play Game

descriptionHTML:
This is a free survival and strategy game. Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats. The enemies are everywhere in the living space, you need to keep alert in the fight against other survivors or zombies. Kill them, or be killed.
HORROR SCHOOL:
You can take a chance and go to the abandoned school. God willing, you may be able to find many precious resources to help you create more powerful weapons to boost your chances of survival.
MARKET CENTER: 
The market will be open in the first 30 minutes of each hour. Enter the chat room during those times to communicate with other survivors and exchange information to help you survive. But remember that not all survivors are friendly.
Guild
Do you want to stay alive all by yourself in this doomsday? Maybe you could get some help from the guild. Radio tower is your connection to the outside world. Repair it, then you can unlock the guild. Many more survivors are waiting for you in the guild continent.
UNION TRADERS: 
Union traders may be helpful under the right circumstances. They can never refuse a good deal. Trade with them your unwanted items, as long as your items are attractive enough for them.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarZ-survival-867255676789139
summary: Preserve your life carefully and thwart off zombies and other threats.
title: WarZ: Law of Survival

description: It's been late summer now, What is your last dream in summer. Ice cream! Yes, just take a bite, feels great. Your love for ice cream is so big that you feel like sharing it with everyone around? Well, with Ice Cream Maker, now you can!Product Feature:- Plenty of ice cream flavors to choose from.- Enjoy the fun of matching decorations- Create delicacy out of your own- Eat and share with your friends and family.- Be the daddy's good helper How to play:- Start from choosing your favorite ice cream flavor. Chocolate, Vanilla, Strawberry & so many more.- Drag to add all the ingredients to the bowl, such as milk, ice, flour, eggs... and mix them.- Pour the mixture to the ice cream machine, wait for seconds to work done.- Decorate your ice cream with ton of toppings, Ice cream, sprinkles, syrups, fruits and so many more- Tap to eat your own made ice cream- Take a picture to share with your best friends and family
descriptionHTML:
It's been late summer now, What is your last dream in summer. Ice cream! Yes, just take a bite, feels great. Your love for ice cream is so big that you feel like sharing it with everyone around?
Well, with Ice Cream Maker, now you can!
Product Feature:
- Plenty of ice cream flavors to choose from.
- Enjoy the fun of matching decorations
- Create delicacy out of your own
- Eat and share with your friends and family.
- Be the daddy's good helper
How to play:
- Start from choosing your favorite ice cream flavor. Chocolate, Vanilla, Strawberry & so many more.
- Drag to add all the ingredients to the bowl, such as milk, ice, flour, eggs... and mix them.
- Pour the mixture to the ice cream machine, wait for seconds to work done.
- Decorate your ice cream with ton of toppings, Ice cream, sprinkles, syrups, fruits and so many more
- Tap to eat your own made ice cream
- Take a picture to share with your best friends and family
summary: Make the best yummy icy ice cream in hot summer,be a good daddy's helper.
title: Ice Cream Maker - Summer Fun

descriptionHTML:
Next chapter of Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D scary game! Defend yourself against robot bears, angry chickens, bunnies and foxes and even worse creatures hiding in the shadows! Welcome to the Cube nightmare safeguarding yourself until the morning comes! Open or close the doors and switch on the light not to let cube bears, foxes and bunnies attack you! Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the attack! It will scare away angry cube creatures that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways!

Nevertheless, be careful! If any cube monster has crept too close, it will be the end of your security guard career… Moreover, the life! Face your nightmare with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game!

Spend five nights at Cube pizzeria hiding from angry cube bears, chickens, bunnies and foxes! Are you afraid of cube bears or other monsters? These robots were made to help in Cube Pizzeria, but during the night they might become unpredictable or even attack you! Who else could be in this nightmare mines? Spend five nights at pizzeria full of scary cube monster! Try Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game – meet cube bear robots and escape from them to survive!

Be a security guard for chicken, fox, bunny and bear robots for five nights and protect Cube Pizzeria from total destruction! Use very limited amount of electricity per night to protect yourself from robots’ attack! Stay in your security office, watch cube creatures with cameras and try to survive! When you run out of power for the night - all cameras and light are off and cube robots are able to move! Beware of cube bear robots walking in the pizzeria! Escape from your nightmare! Face cube robots with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2!

Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 features:

- Cube robot monsters – chickens, foxes, bunnies and bears!
- Different camera views
- 3D Cube World
- New Cube Pizzeria locations to explore
- Five nights to survive

Don’t allow cube bear monsters or angry bunnies and foxes to get close to your security office! They all are robots! Spend five nights at Cube Pizzeria and stay alive! Finish your work safe after five scary and horrible nights with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game! Survive being a pizzeria night security guard and escape from your nightmare! These five nights are going to be the worst nights in your life!

Privacy policy: http://7e4enie.wixsite.com/gamesarcade/single-post/2017/02/16/GAMES-ARCADE-PRIVACY-POLICY

title: Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D ‚Äì 2

comments: Great game! Unobtrusive ads, slickest UI I've ever seen on mobile, great controls (difficult to master but that's part of the challenge - the different unlocked cars have different handling too) It made me so nostalgic for Dune with the desert, sand worms and even thumpers (the lure powerup)! I actually started reading the book again...

The Best This is one of the best mobile games I have ever played! The cars handle amazingly. But you should probobly tell them that you are driving on sans not tarmac in the tutorial. Just one thing I think you should add, FIRST PERSON VEIW!!! That would be awesome!                                                          And is the forklift just an Easter egg from your other games? Cause I don't really see how it's better than the other cars that we already earned...

Beginners experience I'm on the 10 mission. The game is entertaining I ended up playing over an hour. From my experience its not very difficult to get 3 stars. What is difficult and could be the reason for many of these complaints is beating your old scores. The worms block the quickest route on many occasions and to actual control your vehicle perfectly is very difficult. I would like to see a leaderboard to compare my records. Its an addictive game, but it does require a bit of luck to achieve a impressive score.

Great concept. Need improvements like a zoom out option for there is no 1st person view in driving, I hate surprises. I literally kept on losing in round 5 or so, tried really hard but to no luck. Turns out there's a mute option on music, damn!!! That option was really helpful devs. RIP Music%%%%%. Kept finishing in one try after that.

AVOID GAME!! Game is great, love the game, LOVE it, controls suck -don't bother playing this game until the devs actually fix the steering, read the reviews from others, it's not fixed, steering sucks!!!! Game itself is awesome but you can't play it!  Please please please make the turning ratio tuneable! I changed it in settings but still doesn't allow you to tone down the turns. This makes the game difficult and less fun as I try to turn then suddenly I'm in a 360 circle. If I could not turn so hard, then i could play it properly and enjoy it. And before you answer that is tuneable in the settings (like other comments from other users), already tried it on ALL settings so I suggest trying it yourself

Solid game. Needs more levels though, as of now there's only 20 and though the gameplay mechanics are simple I played the first 10 levels without realizing that you can use powerups (probably needs a little 'How-to-play and what's on the screen' section for dumbshits like me), the game feels fresh with the overall 'sand steering' physics; First 14 levels are easy but once you reach level 15, the game starts to get more challenging and fun. Only problem I've faced so far is that my achievements are not being recognized by play games if I earn it offline. I loved the Deathworm concept.
description: Colonization went fine, until They awoke.In the last steps of the evacuation you must collect the remaining research data and avoid being eaten by the giant worms.Race across the dusty planet and seek temporary refuge on cliffs and buildings from the vicious monsters. - Aggressive, scary and unpredictable worm AI. (almost as smart as real worms) - Speed boosters and decoys to help in the wormiest moments. - Multiple cars unlocked throughout the wormy campaign. - 20 challenging worm-filled levels. - Achievements and ghost recordings of your previous worm-evading attempts.

- Achievements and ghost recordings of your previous worm-evading attempts.

comments: A solider game with guns wow I love it

This is AMAZING! What I want, though, is a way to change the camera app you use for the app. I know that bots might not be possible because the phone camera wouldn't be able to recognize the environment; it doesn't even have that feature. So all I'm asking for is a way to change the default camera. I would give 5 stars if you did. Not that you would need it; this app is already highly rated.
I LOVE this app, it is so much better now they have introduced currency.  The only thing I would improvenis that you could take videos as well as pictures.  This ia definitely a 5 star app!

Jonahs idea is brilliant! If you guys could figure out a way to incorporate  bots into the background of this. Running out of streets posted up in buildings in real life like this.  You might have an original smash hit! In the fps gaming world. Noone has yet to do this! You could even add In explosions and a blood screen for hit damage.

Amazed by this game, nice idea! But you should make it like this so there are bullet holes and when we shoot the RPG it explodes where we shot it at, the explosion moved with the screen which looks unrealistic.

Damn, this is dope. You should definitely add some bots, blood, hit points, explosions, more weapons, GPS...and much more! I can see this being a multiplayer game in the future, people going outside playing with friends in the hood with this instead of paintball and stuff... But still needing a lot of improvement.

comments: Game ending glitches ruin the experience. In map mode, when moving to dwarf town, if you hit down instead of left, it then puts the arrow to move left into a cliff you can't move into and game is perma frozen. I deleted and reinstalled and it we as still at that point on the map. Otherwise, a nice game.

The game is fun, a nice match 3 rpg. The different character responses to dialogue is a nice touch that I haven't found in similar games. Problems though is the very limited amount of energy and the high energy cost of levels. The inventory is also very small and filled up way to fast. The log in rewards are sometimes very disappointing too (10 gold? Why bother?). Some messages that pop up are in french which like many means I have no idea why I cant use the training/forging options in places other than celsius. The game is fun, but to really enjoy it you have to spend real money. For me the game is a temporary enjoyment that wont stay on my phone for too long.

The AP shouldn't be used to navigate through the map. Glitches closes the app and you loose the AP . Also, why the different language, that I can't read in the mines under training and forge? If made in app purchase then the chest shouldn't five you the same equipment that you would find anyway. Would be an awesome game if fixed properly.

I played this game under the impression i was going to gain cards for another game called Primal  Legends according to a message i saw on their board. I have completed the requirements and still haven't received my rewards. I'm pretty upset about this. I'll give this Game an appropriate score once i recieve my rewards.  Also: can you change that your app pauses my music when i start it? I can't play this game and my music at the same time which stops me from playing this game often
The game itself is fine but the action points required to travel esp. the dumb north pass means wasting 3 days travelling and doing nothing else.  So unless you want to pay don't play.

I installed it and waited for the downloads that take 5+ minutes to download. I tapped the icon to play and after the screen with the developers logo I get a blank screen and a message that says the app has stopped working. I deleted immediately and never got to play the game.

descriptionHTML:
Are you in for an intuitive game with a real story, heroes, a storyline and humor?

Set off on an adventure with your heroes and raise yourselves against the forces which are ravaging the county of Acilion. Quests, dialogs, spells and decisive choices are the components of this adventure with an enthralling storyline and intuitive gameplay.


FEATURES

• A roleplaying game with an enthralling story which is far from formulaic.
• Recruit, train and improve your heroes: weapons, artefacts, spells, skills, levelling...
• Make them speak with other characters: your choices will greatly influence the story.
• Each hero has his own personality: the composition of your team will also impact the storyline.
• Explore huge 3D dungeons, inextricable forests, haunted mines, forgotten temples and a lot of other places: each of them corresponds to a quest.
• Travel in a vast world from the big map and see where your friends are playing (if you have friends - if you haven't, we can't help you)
• Use puzzle games to control your heroes and cast spells in combat.
• Play with your friends: lend heroes to each other during battles, offer coins of gold and action points and help them unlocking exclusive quests (friends are not provided with the app)
• Play for free: in-app purchases are possible but *never* mandatory.
• A large dose of humor!

An internet connection is required to play this game.

AN IMPORTANT NOTE: downloading and installing Celsius Heroes is free but some in-game items can be purchased with real money. If you do not wish to use this feature, please disable the in-app purchases in your device settings.

ASSISTANCE
Are you experiencing an issue or do you want to report something about the game? Please visit http://celsiusonline.uservoice.com/ or contact us in-game by selecting Help > Feedback & Support.


WIKIA
You can also visit Celsius Heroes' Wikia here:
http://celsiusheroes.wikia.com/

Privacy policy:
http://www.celsiusheroes.com/privacy-policy/


Make new friends and keep yourself up-to-date about Celsius Heroes' latest news here:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/celsiusheroes
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CelsiusHeroes
recentChanges: * New monsters, locations and characters for Celsius Heroes Adventures
* New packs added and a horse to move faster on the map
* Information added about the locations of heroes and the current quests
summary: Are you in for an intuitive game with a riveting story and lots of humor?
title: Celsius Heroes

description: New super cute kitten games for girls and boys who love cute little cats! Kitty Meow Meow welcomes all kids in her adorable cat world. Build the purrfect kitty cat house, always clean up kitten restroom and play the best kids games in the magical kitten park!Kitty Meow Meow cat games for girls and boys who love super cute kittens:¬∑ NEW! Brush, cut, curl, color and style Kitty Meow Meow‚Äôs hair in the new cat hair salon!¬∑ NEW! Check out the restaurant menu and feed the kittens with new and tasty cat snacks! ¬∑ NEW! Look for suits and hats in two new shops at the kitten mall!¬∑ Dress up your pet kitty cat and design the cutest cat outfit!¬∑ Do the purrfect manicure, give a cat face spa and have a bubble bath at the beauty salon!¬∑ Dance, play music and have fun in the kitten dance club!¬∑ Shop for new furniture at the mall and decorate Kitty Meow Meow's cat house!¬∑ Help Kitty Meow Meow clean up the cat toilet and change the litter!¬∑ Play five Kitty Meow Meow's favorite cat games in the Park!¬∑ Climb the magic castle, play with flowers, ride a horse, solve puzzles and train your memory!¬∑ Collect as many coins and pink diamonds as you can!¬∑ Watch videos with Kitty Meow Meow and get more coins for new game items!Free & Paid Game ContentThis app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.You can play Restaurant, Mall, Manicure, Pink Hair, Magic Castle and Horse Riding mini games for free. Curly Hair, Purple Hair, Cross a River, Find a Diamond and Flower Fun mini games are free to play but certain game items or activities are locked with game coins and video ads.You can purchase separate mini games (Cat Face, Coat Care, Cat Toilet and Dance Club) or the full game version with no ads.- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for KidsCrafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. · NEW! Brush, cut, curl, color and style Kitty Meow Meow’s hair in the new cat hair salon!
· NEW! Check out the restaurant menu and feed the kittens with new and tasty cat snacks!
· NEW! Look for suits and hats in two new shops at the kitten mall!
· Dress up your pet kitty cat and design the cutest cat outfit!
· Do the purrfect manicure, give a cat face spa and have a bubble bath at the beauty salon!
· Dance, play music and have fun in the kitten dance club!
· Shop for new furniture at the mall and decorate Kitty Meow Meow's cat house!
· Help Kitty Meow Meow clean up the cat toilet and change the litter!
· Play five Kitty Meow Meow's favorite cat games in the Park!
· Climb the magic castle, play with flowers, ride a horse, solve puzzles and train your memory!
· Collect as many coins and pink diamonds as you can!
· Watch videos with Kitty Meow Meow and get more coins for new game items!


Free & Paid Game Content
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money.
You can play Restaurant, Mall, Manicure, Pink Hair, Magic Castle and Horse Riding mini games for free. Curly Hair, Purple Hair, Cross a River, Find a Diamond and Flower Fun mini games are free to play but certain game items or activities are locked with game coins and video ads.
You can purchase separate mini games (Cat Face, Coat Care, Cat Toilet and Dance Club) or the full game version with no ads.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through games they love.
Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

PRIVACY
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog‚Äôs race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks

description: If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.AMAZING ACTION!Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!AMAZING CARS!Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!TAKE THE LEAD!Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??CHALLENGE THE WORLD!Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!
descriptionHTML:
If you are looking for REAL mobile rally simulation, than you are in the right place. Race at 60 fps in mud, snow, dirt and asphalt in this fast-paced racing game.

AMAZING ACTION!
Prove yourself fast in daytime and nighttime tracks, dare to speed in hostile conditions and terrain, drift along the turns and pay attention to your co-driver's pacenotes (Or he will get mad, we can assure it!).

DRIVE ON REAL-WORLD TRACKS!
Drive on awesome tracks: they are all modeled around existing and famous rally tracks, feel every little road's roughness, run on the edge of a pitfall, feel the breeze of the Alps' snow and the heat of the Mexico sun!

AMAZING CARS!
Customize the driver's name and the name of your co-pilot together with their country flags and stick them on your car's window! Get your livery dirty while trying to nail that turn, chose among a lot of different cars, each with its handling and performance!

TAKE THE LEAD!
Chose among two different championships: J-SPEC for beginners and S-SPEC for legendary drivers! Will you get to top??

CHALLENGE THE WORLD!
Smash the leaderboards and show the world you are the fastest rally driver around... or show to them right on track: with multiplayer mode you can challenge a friend or players from all over the world!

Get M.U.D. Rally now, join the Rally!
developerAddress: via l.da vinci 13, Polistena, 89024 RC, Italy

comments: My favorite game I have ever played on mobile.  Thought I wasn't going to like it the first day until I read a review that said it was better than the regular game. Went back and played it. Now I have logged in every single day since launch day last year. I actually love it so much I play with two separate accounts on two different phones. Now that's most definitely something I will probably never ever do with another game ever made. That should say it all right there. Best role-playing game on mobile. Best game on mobile I have ever played and I've played hundreds. Nuff said.

Minus 1 point for the simple fact the "leagues" or competitions to win rewards aren't divided into sub ranks. And only the top 15 players get the good prizes. So when you start you're literally 40-50,000 places away from ever getting a cool character. Which sucks. Seems a bit unfair, the people who seen the advert for this game first obviously are way, WAY ahead. eg, played heavily for 2 days I'm now rank 10, beginning to show already. To place is rank 80 üòÇ

The new arena future is great. But there is lots of room for improvement. If they start linking it with money then all effort down the drain.  Edit- Now I am starting to dislike the game. Event Rewards are no more good. If you pump lots of money then only you get good characters. Arena feature doesn't allow us to select players in public matches .

Great game but when i earn 300 green gems to buy a new add or  character ,You end up getting something completly different from the prize offered. Tried twice to get bruz the chopper an got 6 castimir coins. This happens most of the time an is very discouraging. Is there anyway to fix this issue?

It's been a month now and the bug still hasn't been fixed. LET ME HOST IN THE ARENA!!!! I can only join matches from my fellowship but whenever i try to host my own to get more trophies it would never lead me to the part which level i want to do. I just get stuck on the "connecting to matchmaking" loop. Please
Decent game. But the back to back events keep us from kicking players from the fellowship. Its extremely annoying. I've submitted a ticket but it didn't solve anything. Fix this issue immediately.
description: Certain that it will help overthrow Sauron and raise himself as a force for good in his place, Celebrimbor has forged a new ring of power.  Alongside this ring of power, he has forged a series of minor rings that are bound to its fate and call to Champions across Middle-earth; wage the Shadow War and overthrow Sauron's armies.Continue Talion's journey through Mordor and wage real-time battles to turn Sauron's army against him with the Champions of Middle-earth and your own personal Orc army.COMMAND ICONIC MIDDLE-EARTH CHAMPIONS-Collect, equip, and upgrade iconic characters from Shadow of War and The Lord of the Rings such as Talion, Celebrimbor, Gimli, and Galadriel, all controlled by the new rings of power.FIGHT REAL-TIME BATTLES-Battle your way across hostile regions of Mordor.-Direct your team's combat tactics in real-time and launch powered-up special attacks when it matters most.AMASS AN ARMY OF ORCS AND NEMESES-Dominate your Orc nemeses or accumulate a trail of dead.  Each Orc you face remembers your decisions, creating a unique experience for every player with the award-winning Nemesis System.JOIN A FELLOWSHIP-Strategize with your friends and request/share upgrades to help your journey
descriptionHTML:
Certain that it will help overthrow Sauron and raise himself as a force for good in his place, Celebrimbor has forged a new ring of power. Alongside this ring of power, he has forged a series of minor rings that are bound to its fate and call to Champions across Middle-earth; wage the Shadow War and overthrow Sauron's armies.

Continue Talion's journey through Mordor and wage real-time battles to turn Sauron's army against him with the Champions of Middle-earth and your own personal Orc army.

COMMAND ICONIC MIDDLE-EARTH CHAMPIONS
-Collect, equip, and upgrade iconic characters from Shadow of War and The Lord of the Rings such as Talion, Celebrimbor, Gimli, and Galadriel, all controlled by the new rings of power.

FIGHT REAL-TIME BATTLES
-Battle your way across hostile regions of Mordor.
-Direct your team's combat tactics in real-time and launch powered-up special attacks when it matters most.

AMASS AN ARMY OF ORCS AND NEMESES
-Dominate your Orc nemeses or accumulate a trail of dead. Each Orc you face remembers your decisions, creating a unique experience for every player with the award-winning Nemesis System.

JOIN A FELLOWSHIP
-Strategize with your friends and request/share upgrades to help your journey

comments: Game has great graphics and UI but i hated the combat, it dragged out for like 10 minutes and i still lose, finding it pointless for me to want to continue playing... just sitting there gaining and losing. Doesn't ever seem to let me win and never let me lose either.. whenever I'm close to losing I keep getting the advantage but once I start winning I lose more often... I was stuck in this cycle for about 10 minutes before I just said this is stupid and quit

This game is fun! The only thing I'd change is to add tabs for your quests and which monsters are in which areas because I have a terrible memory and it's a pain to travel back and forth all the time to see what I need to do/where to go

Utterly disappointing. There is no pc avatar, the combat graphic is nothing but a probability bar, you can't sell anything that you've bought for the uninhabited house, and the house itself is just sitting on a totally meaningless expanse of terminal green. Is it supposed to be grass? I mean, if other people are enjoying it, that's great. I'm just not one of those people.

Way too buggy. Couldn't read the tutorial because the word bubbles kept flashing instead of staying still, and it's the same in combat. It makes it almost unplayable. :/ Please fix because I love this concept!

The game is pretty enjoyable, the graphics are cute, the fighting depending the person can get boring though I enjoy it. Only real problem I have right now is that the game crashes a lot, like when I go to press the free gems, or when I change from home screen to travel screen etc. I have an HTC U11+ android version 8.
I really enjoyed this game. I was pretty disappointed when I got to the end of it. I wanted it to keep going. Are there any expansion plans or sequels planned?

You can buy castles worthy of kings and queens, and customize the interior of your home with furniture for all tastes. See the cycle of day and night influencing scenery and hunting. Travel around the world and try to hunt down all mythical creatures to make a fortune.- There are 8 completely unique castles.- More than 150 furniture to customize the interior of your castle.- Over 60 different creatures to hunt.- Day and night cycle.- Several quests around the world.- Show your friends how awesome your castle is in multiplayer mode.- Set traps to increase your fortune.- 9 weapons with different attributes.- Visit the Frostland Tavern for a bet.- Become famous by capturing all legendary creatures. Come on an adventure in the amazing world of Medieval Life!Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/MedievalLifeGame

comments: There is something wrong with Aria's skill 1 description, it says activated on 20 but it actually activates on 15th combo. Overall great casual game. Hoping for more customizations (character & map) and a new character as well. And please adjust the game so we can buy characters offline, after all its an offline game.

It's cute and easy to play. It is really addicting at first but when I got all the Google play achievements I got bored. It's a pity that the cute characters don't have a background story or that the music and level is so repetitive.. It's a casual game I know.. But it really lacks depth for it to be replayable. But there's a potential on this game..

It's enjoyable.. Great concept guys üòÅ if you add other maps to jump, it will be more amusing.. But still, the way it is now is already good.. Great graphics and simple control.. Maybe other player will find it lacking of something.. But not me üòÇ so i gave 5* üòò

Makes me tired of playing by buying amon and got to the point that i upgrade him. Feels like all my hardship did not payed off because of small combo height improvement(not to mention its hard to build up because of x blocks and amon jumps slow). You should've put a "testing character button" so that people can choose wisely not luckily.

Promising.. can't control where the character moves making it like a random feel in the game. Combos are hard to stack also in this way. Hmm.. could i suggest the shield power up break the x block or guard your combo from breaking? Both would be awesome tho. Uninstalling for now.
I would rate this 5 stars but, WHY ITS "TIME ATTACK LIKE" DEVELOPERS? IT SHOULD'VE BE AN INVINITE JUMP GAMES, VERY DISSAPOINTED.

descriptionHTML:
Realistic behaviour of three kinds of drones. In the game we have previewed such physical factors as workpiece weight, wind speed, engine power, frame square, inertia, light free flight standfast, and that was fulfilled on the technology Nvidia Physx.

Multicopter workpieces are prone to physical damage. Frame, engine and other workpieces will be destroyed or removed when falling. The repair of each workpiece will cost you some coin’s amount.

Earn coins in missions or free flight. You can also purchase thr necessary coins.

Purchase and upgrade of different workpieces:

* Batteries - Iincrease the flight time
* Frame Kits - Choice of three frame types (tricopter, quadcopter, hexacopter)
* Motors - Increase speed and power
* GPS Module - Enable to fight the wind drift automatically
* Telemetry Kit - Visualizing the Telemetry screen with parameters' display (speed, height, wind, battery charge, signal, strength level)
* Ultrasonic sensor - Reduce incidence of accidental crashes on the low height
* GoPro - camera by default, fixed
* Brushless Gimbal 2D - Suspension for camera that make drone movement smooth.

Three game modes:

1. Free flight in the city. Collect coins. Perform acrobatic tricks and cartwheels in all sides and earn bonus coins.

2. Racing on the crowded city streets. Collect time at every checkpoint. Gained time will turn into coins on the finishing point.

3. Kill zombies in various ways. Make a trap on the roof edge and the road. Kill them with artillery attack.

Large-scaled, highly detailed urban landscape with realistic cars movement. You can interact with citizens.

You can change the maximum tilt angle of fish-tailing in game options. Choose type of control. Also it is possible to select control for left-hand or right-hand players.
summary: Multicopter 3D Flight Simulator. Get race, update new parts and save the city!
title: Multirotor Sim Z
